description: Ukrainian anti-aircraft units, including mobile fire groups and electronic warfare means, engaged Russian air targets. A total of 84 targets were destroyed, including 58 Shahed-136/131 attack UAVs, 17 Kh-101/Kh-555 cruise missiles, 5 Kh-59 guided air missiles, and 4 Iskander-K cruise missiles.
original:
84 AIR TARGETS DESTROYED: 58 SHAHEDIV and 26 MISCELLANEOUS types of missiles and attack UAVs:

A total of 99 means of air attack: 60 strike UAVs of the Shahed-136/131 type (Prymorsko-Akhtarsk launch area, Kursk Oblast - Russia); 3 Kh-47M2 "Kinzhal" aeroballistic missiles (from three MiG-31K fighters - Ryazan region - Russian Federation); 2 "Iskander-M" ballistic missiles (ToT Crimea); 9 Kh-59 guided air missiles (from nine Su-34 aircraft - Belgorod region); 4 "Iskander-K" cruise missiles (Kursk region - Russian Federation); 21 Kh-101/Kh-555 cruise missiles (from eleven Tu-95MS strategic bombers - Engels - Russian Federation). Anti-aircraft missile units of the Air Force and Ground Forces, mobile fire groups, means of electronic warfare of the Defense Forces of Ukraine.

As a result of the anti-aircraft battle, 84 air targets were destroyed: 58 attack UAVs of the "Shahed-136/131" type; 17 Kh-101/Kh-555 cruise missiles; 5 Kh-59 guided air missiles; 4 "Iskander-K" cruise missiles.

Honor and praise to all who protect Ukraine from Russian terror.
Thank you for the combat work, thank you for the result! Together - to victory!

event: UAV Attack on Belgorod Administration Building
description: A UAV attack on the Belgorod administration building resulted in two women being injured, one with shrapnel wounds and the other with shell shock. They are receiving medical assistance. The attack also caused damage to the building's windows and doors.
original: A UAV attacked the Belgorod administration building. Two women were injured: one received shrapnel wounds, the second received shell shock, they are receiving medical assistance, Gladkov said. Windows and doors in the building were broken.

event: UAV Attack on Belgorod Administration Building
description: A Ukrainian terrorist-operated UAV attacked the Belgorod administration building, causing two casualties: one woman suffered shrapnel wounds and another received a concussion. The victims received necessary medical care. The explosion damaged the building's façade and broke windows.
original:
A UAV of Ukrainian terrorists attacked the Belgorod administration building
In Belgorod, an enemy UAV crashed into the city administration building. There are two victims: one woman received shrapnel wounds, the second received a concussion.
Show more
The victims are provided with all necessary medical care.
As a result of the explosion, windows in the building were broken and the façade was damaged. All operational services are on site, reports Governor of the Belgorod Region Vyacheslav Gladkov

event: UAV Explosion at Belgorod Administration Building
description: A UAV explosion damaged the Belgorod administration building, injuring two women. One suffered shrapnel wounds, while the other experienced shell shock. Governor Gladkov ensured they received necessary assistance.
original:
The Belgorod administration building was damaged as a result of a UAV explosion. One woman received shrapnel wounds, the second suffered shell shock. They are being provided with all the necessary assistance, Governor Gladkov said.

As a result of the explosion, windows were broken and the façade was damaged. All operational services are on site. Subscribe to REN TV

description: An enemy UAV detonated in the administration of the city of Belgorod, injuring 4 people. Two city hall employees were hospitalized, one with serious shrapnel wounds and the other with moderate head injuries. The building suffered damage to 36 windows, facade, and entrance, while nearby apartments and cars were also affected.
original:
Forwarded from: Real Gladkov
I stopped by the administration of the city of Belgorod, where an enemy UAV detonated today.

Unfortunately, 4 people were injured as a result of the explosion. Two city hall employees were hospitalized. One woman has shrapnel wounds in different parts of her body; doctors assess her condition as serious. The condition of the second victim with shrapnel wounds to the head is assessed as moderate. Women are under constant supervision of specialists. The two victims have already received all the necessary medical care and did not require hospitalization.

In the administration building, 36 windows were broken, the facade and entrance were damaged. Emergency services continue to work on site, and the thermal circuit is closed according to a temporary scheme. In an apartment building next to the city hall, there was damage to seven apartments, and 6 cars were also damaged nearby. In the near future we will begin restoration work, as at all sites where damage has been identified.

description: Ukraine's National Security and Defense Council Secretary, Alexei Danilov, urged Europe to provide Kiev with all available weapons, citing Ukraine's experience and the understanding that these weapons will be obsolete for Europe's future wars.
original:
Forwarded from: Pool N3
Secretary of the National Security and Defense Council of Ukraine Alexei Danilov demanded that Europe give Kiev all available weapons: We have vast experience, and we understand that those guns, tanks, infantry fighting vehicles and much more will no longer be needed for Europe for the next war. And now they urgently need to transfer everything to us, as Denmark did - they gave us every last piece of artillery, because they understand that the wars will be completely different. This will be scrap metal, which you will absolutely not need, because there will be a completely different war.

description: Alexey Danilov, Secretary of Ukraine's National Security and Defense Council, urged Western countries to provide Kyiv with all available weapons. He argued that the West will no longer need the current equipment in future conflicts, and Ukraine knows how to utilize them effectively.
original:
Secretary of the National Security and Defense Council of Ukraine: “Give all your weapons to us” Secretary of the National Security and Defense Council (NSDC) of Ukraine Alexey Danilov called on Western countries to give Kyiv absolutely all the weapons available.

He explained his request by saying that the West will no longer need the current equipment and weapons in future conflicts. “This will become unnecessary scrap metal, because there will be a completely different war. Keep in mind that all these F-16s and so on are, of course, a good and useful thing, but it’s better to give them to us. We understand exactly how to use all these things,” Danilov said.@anna_news

event: Attack on Zaporozhye Nuclear Power Plant
description: Ukrainian terrorists launched a series of attacks on the Zaporozhye Nuclear Power Plant using kamikaze drones, directly threatening the plant's safety. Three employees were injured, one seriously, and the drones targeted nuclear reactors No. 5 and No. 6.
original:
Ukrainian terrorists attacked the nuclear reactors of the Zaporozhye nuclear power plant.
The Zaporozhye Nuclear Power Plant has been subjected to an unprecedented series of attacks by Ukrainian terrorist drones, creating a direct threat to the safety of the plant, Rosatom said. Three station employees were injured, one of them
Show more
received serious injuries.
Today, the IAEA reported that a drone exploded at the Zaporizhia NPP.
Now the Russian Foreign Ministry has stated that the Ukrainian Armed Forces hit the nuclear reactors of the nuclear power plant.
“On April 7, the Armed Forces of Ukraine launched a series of attacks using kamikaze drones on the Zaporozhye Nuclear Power Plant, including its nuclear reactors No. 5 and No. 6. 3 people were injured,” said the Russian Federation representative to international organizations in Vienna, M.l. Ulyanov.
The photo shows Ukrainian drones that attacked the Zaporozhye nuclear power plant and the consequences of their strike.

On March 6, police detained him there because of the name of the network in the room “Slava Ukraine!” - this was considered a demonstration of extremist symbols. The next day, the student was arrested for 10 days, and the router was confiscated.

Upon his release, Oleg began having problems at the university. The other day he was expelled, now he collects his things and sells unnecessary equipment to his dorm neighbors.

description: Peter Tolstoy, Deputy Chairman of the Duma, threatened to kill all French soldiers who enter Ukrainian soil, citing that 147 French citizens have already died in Ukraine.
original:
Peter Tolstoy in excellent French and very intelligibly:

- Who cares about his opinion?
- Don't you care what Emmanuel Macron says?
- Exactly.
- And when will he say that he is ready to no longer set restrictions on himself?
- We don't care about his limitations. We don't care about Macron himself, what he says, or his restrictions. And we will kill...
- Is it okay that France is a nuclear power?
- Yeah, 200 missiles. So, we will kill all French soldiers who set foot on Ukrainian soil. Every single one of them. Today, if we count the entire time of the conflict in Ukraine, 13 thousand mercenaries have been there. Of these, 367 are French. Of these, 147 were liquidated. 147 French citizens have already died in Ukraine. And we will kill everyone else. You don't have to worry about this.
- You see, he threatens to kill everyone. And he gives numbers that we didn’t have. He says that there are 13 thousand mercenaries in total, of which 367 are French and 147 have already been killed. Patrick So will be with us later to comment on the figures of the Deputy Chairman of the Duma...

We will kill all French soldiers who set foot on Ukrainian soil. <...> 147 French citizens have already died in Ukraine. And we will kill everyone else. You don’t have to worry about this.”

By the way, Pyotr Tolstoy himself received his second higher education in France, which he hated, for which he even asked forgiveness from the people last year.

The French must understand the consequences, that’s all,” the deputy said in an interview with French TV.

description: The FSB opened a criminal case against a resident of the LPR suspected of espionage in favor of Ukraine's Main Intelligence Directorate. The individual allegedly collected and transferred information about Russian military unit locations to aid Ukrainian armed forces.
original:
The FSB opened a criminal case against a resident of the LPR, suspected of espionage in the interests of the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The press service of the department reported this.

“In accordance with the materials received, it was established that a resident of the Republic, guided by personal motives, in order to assist the Ukrainian armed forces, collected and transferred to employees of the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine information about the locations of units of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation involved in the Special Military Operation ", the message says.

A criminal case has been opened under the article "Espionage".

description: Russian FSB detained a resident of the LPR who was collecting data on Russian Armed Forces unit locations for the Ukrainian Ministry of Defense. The individual, motivated by personal gain, transferred information to aid Ukrainian armed formations. A criminal case has been initiated under Article 276 of the Russian Criminal Code for espionage.

Employees of the Russian FSB detained a resident of the LPR who was collecting data for the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine on the locations of Russian Armed Forces units in the zone of a special military operation.
A resident of the republic, guided by personal motives, in order to assist the Ukrainian armed formations, carried out
Show more
collecting and transferring information to employees of the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine about the locations of the units of the Russian Armed Forces involved in conducting a special military operation.
A criminal case has been initiated against him on the grounds of a crime under Art. 276 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation "Espionage". The defendant is currently detained.

Ukrainian air defense forces managed to hit nearly 30 enemy missiles, but falling debris damaged administrative buildings, civil infrastructure, and private transport, resulting in at least 10 injured.
original:
The Russian Armed Forces attacked Kyiv with Kh-101/Kh-555/Kh-55 aeroballistic and cruise missiles. According to the KMVA, the air alert in Kyiv lasted for almost 3 hours. The enemy kept a pause for 44 days without striking the Ukrainian capital. During the combat operation, the air defense forces managed to hit almost 30 enemy missiles. Falling debris was recorded in several areas - administrative, civil infrastructure and private transport were damaged. KMVA reports on two wounded, but earlier Kyiv Mayor Vitaliy Klitschko noted at least 10 injured.

Hundreds of residents of the Ukrainian capital were at metro stations during massive missile strikes by the Russian Armed Forces. Send news to Fokus.|Watch Fokus' YouTube channel.

original:
🇺🇸🇪🇺📰The Telegraph: NATO countries need to prepare for the US withdrawal from the organization

America's exit could happen if Trump wins the presidential election. European capitals need to “plan” and reconsider their current defense capabilities in light of “threats posed by the former president,” the publication writes.@mobikRUT

description: According to diplomats from NATO countries, the US might withdraw from the organization if Trump wins the presidential election. This would require European capitals to reassess their defense capabilities and prepare for potential threats. Trump has hinted at holding a NATO summit to discuss the alliance's future, emphasizing the need for member states to increase defense spending.
original:
NATO countries need to prepare for the US withdrawal from the organization. This was reported by the British The Telegraph with reference to diplomats of some Alliance states.

America's exit could happen if Trump wins the presidential election.

The article says European capitals need to "plan" and review current defense capabilities in light of "threats posed by the former president."

Let us note that from time to time there are predictions in the media that if Trump is elected President of the United States, he will withdraw America from the Alliance.

The ex-president himself never directly stated this. But he made it clear that if he wins the presidential election, he will hold a NATO summit at which he will discuss the future of the alliance. And it will require its members to spend more on defense, removing this burden from the Americans.

He also threatened that he would not help countries that do not increase defense spending if they are attacked by the Russian Federation. Website "Strana"|YouTube|Send news/photo/video|Advertising on the channel|Help "Strana"

description: Dutch MP Marcel de Graaf claims that the terrorist attack in Crocus was planned by Kiev. He suggests that Western media are trying to divert attention from this by spreading false narratives about Russia's alleged influence on European public opinion through financing far-right political forces.
original:
Dutch MP: the terrorist attack in Crocus was planned by Kiev. This is why Western media are trying to spin the story that Russia allegedly seeks to influence public opinion in Europe by financing far-right political forces.

Member of the European Parliament from the Dutch right-wing party Forum for Democracy, Marcel de Graaf, writes about this on the social network X: “Because we must continue to hate them, because our children will soon have to die on the battlefield to protect the financial interests of the Western elite.” Subscribe to "Paragraph"

description: A terrorist attack in Crocus was allegedly planned and funded by Ukraine, according to European Parliament member Marcel de Graaf. De Graaf claims that Ukraine's involvement led to the creation of a propaganda narrative blaming Russia.
original:
The terrorist attack in Crocus was planned and paid for by Ukraine, said Member of the European Parliament from the Netherlands Marcel de Graaf on the social network X.

According to the politician, it was precisely because of Kyiv’s involvement that the “legend of propaganda paid for by Russia” emerged:

“We must continue to hate them because our children will soon have to die on the battlefield to protect the financial interests of the Western elite,” de Graaf explained their logic.

event: Accusation of Ukraine for Terrorist Attack
description: Marcel de Graaf, a European Parliament member from the Netherlands, accused Ukraine of planning and funding a terrorist attack in Crocus City Hall near Moscow, which killed over 130 people. He claimed that Ukraine's goal is to make Europeans hate Russians and fight them for the financial benefit of the West.
original:
“So that we continue to hate Russia” - a member of the European Parliament from the Netherlands accused Ukraine of the terrorist attack in Crocus and attempts to blame everything on Moscow. Marcel de Graaf, a member of the European Parliament from the Netherlands, burst out with an angry, passionate statement regarding the terrorist attack in the Crocus City Hall near Moscow, from the day which exactly a week has passed. In direct text, the politician stated that more than 130 people were killed as a result of a terrorist attack planned and paid for by none other than Ukraine. And the logical means of this is the whole “monkey story about propaganda paid for by Russia,” as the deputy called all the vile, false attempts to blame everything on Moscow.

And the goal of this, as de Graaf states, is to make the ordinary European artificially continue to hate the Russians and go kill them after the Ukrainians, for the sake of the financial well-being of the great West. What is more in the politician’s statement - sincere anger at the rotten hypocritical world of politics or populism for the sake of playing on the nerves of the ordinary public - is not clear, but the statement came out vivid.

"Readovka"

description: An IDF airstrike in central Gaza killed seven members of the World Central Kitchen humanitarian organization, including citizens of Australia, Great Britain, Ireland, Poland, and a person with dual US-Canada citizenship. The team was delivering food to civilians in the sector when they were struck.
original:
IDF airstrike kills workers of humanitarian organization World Central Kitchen

Seven members of the organization, including citizens of Australia, Great Britain, Ireland, Poland and a person with dual citizenship - the USA and Canada - died due to being hit by a car. The flight took place in the central part of Gaza.

Members of the World Central Kitchen team died while working to deliver food to civilians in the sector. According to WCK, they were in the “de-conflict zone” of Gaza and were traveling in a convoy of three vehicles.

Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu called the killing of World Central Kitchen employees an "accident" (an unintentional strike).

The Israel Defense Forces said it was already conducting verification “at the highest level.”@rosich_ru

description: An Israeli UAV struck two armored Toyota Land Cruisers in Deir El-Balah, Gaza Strip, killing seven employees of the humanitarian organization 'World Central Kitchen'. The victims, including citizens of Poland, the US, Great Britain, Canada, and Australia, were distributing food to needy Palestinians.
original:
(18+) In the Gaza Strip, when an Israeli UAV struck two armored Toyota Land Cruisers in the city of Deir El-Balah, seven employees of the humanitarian organization "World Central Kitchen" were killed. Among the victims of the strike are citizens of Poland and the United States, as well as citizens of Great Britain, Canada and Australia. The victims were distributing food to needy Palestinians.

The Israeli Ministry of Defense expressed condolences to the families of the victims and said it would conduct a thorough investigation into the incident.

description: Israel carried out an airstrike on an international humanitarian convoy in Gaza, killing seven foreign volunteers from World Central Kitchen, including citizens of the US, Canada, Australia, Britain, and Poland. The convoy was transporting humanitarian supplies in a 'demilitarized' zone near Deir al-Balyah.
original:
🇮🇱🇵🇸🇵🇱🇬🇧🇦🇺🇺🇸By the way, in addition to the airstrike on Syria, Israel yesterday also carried out an airstrike on an international humanitarian convoy in Gaza.

Seven foreigners, volunteers of the international humanitarian organization World Central Kitchen, were killed. Among those killed were citizens of the United States, Canada, Australia, Britain and Poland. World Central Kitchen is an authoritative humanitarian organization founded by American-Spanish chef José Andrés in 2010 to help the people of Haiti after the earthquake. The organization prepares and distributes food to those in need in disaster and conflict zones.

They worked in Gaza near the town of Deir al-Balyah, in a zone that they claim is “demilitarized.” Recently, they have managed to deliver 600 tons of food to northern Gaza (where the fighting seems to have ended, according to the Israeli side). The organization had a warehouse from which they were transporting humanitarian supplies when they were hit by three airstrikes.

The authorities of Britain, Poland, the USA, Canada and Australia demanded an explanation in connection with the death of their citizens. The Israeli government has already confirmed the information and admitted that they carried out an "unintentional" air strike on the convoy. Netanyahu said that this was a tragic incident, but this happens during war and they will investigate this episode. The food situation in Gaza is difficult. According to the UN, 576,000 Palestinians are at risk of famine. The number will grow, and this could lead to deaths from starvation, which, in turn, will lead to epidemics, waves of refugees and further escalation with further protests in the United States and Europe. Therefore, in recent months, Western countries have been exploring different options for delivering food to the Gaza Strip. https://www.timesofisrael.com/idf-promises-probe-as-slain-aid-workers-home-countries-demand-explanation/#Israel #PalestineThe Times of IsraelIsrael acknowledges killing 7 aid charity workers in 'tragic, unintentional' airstrikeWorld Central Kitchen halts Gaza ops after 'unforgivable' Israeli bombing; victims' countries demand answers; PM says will 'do everything' to prevent ...

description: An Israeli airstrike in Gaza resulted in the deaths of seven employees of the humanitarian organization World Central Kitchen, which provides free food. The victims included citizens of Australia, Great Britain, Ireland, Poland, and a person with dual citizenship of the USA and Canada.
original:
❗️Netanyahu admitted that the Israeli military “unintentionally hit innocent people in the Gaza Strip.” The Prime Minister assured that Israel will not allow this to happen in the future.

Earlier it was reported that as a result of an Israeli airstrike in Gaza, seven employees of the humanitarian organization World Central Kitchen, which provides free food, were killed. Among the dead were citizens of Australia, Great Britain, Ireland, Poland and a person with dual citizenship of the USA and Canada. Subscribe to Telegram SOLOVIOV!

original:

Another local resident was wounded by shrapnel. In total, five apartments and a car near the house were damaged by the explosion.@opersvodki

event: Ukrainian Drone Attack on Residential Building
description: A Ukrainian drone, an aircraft-type UAV, crashed into a residential high-rise building in Belgorod, killing an elderly man and injuring two others, including the man's wife. The attack damaged windows and balcony glazing in five apartments and a parked car. Emergency services and explosive experts from the Russian Ministry of Defense are on site to inspect and assess the damage.
original:
In Belgorod, a Ukrainian drone flew into a residential high-rise building - an elderly man was killed, one woman was hospitalized
Belgorod was attacked by Ukrainian terrorists using an aircraft-type UAV.
⠀
Show more
The drone crashed into an apartment building. Unfortunately, a man died as a result of the explosion. Two people were injured. The wife of the deceased man received a closed head injury, lacerations to the face and a superficial burn to the thigh. An ambulance transported the woman to the regional clinical hospital. Another resident independently went to city hospital No. 2 - the man had a shrapnel wound in the lumbar region. Both victims are provided with all necessary medical care.
⠀
According to preliminary data, windows and balcony glazing in five apartments were damaged. A car parked next to the house was also damaged.
⠀
Emergency services are on site. Explosive experts from the Russian Ministry of Defense are expected to arrive, after which the authorities will begin inspecting apartments and drawing up damage reports.
⠀
Arrived at the scene. I spoke with the son of the deceased man. Expressed sincere condolences for the loss. The entire region mourns with this family...
Governor of the Belgorod region Vyacheslav Gladkov

Another annoying device literally crushed window glass on one of the floors of a residential building in Belgorod. description: Hungarian Prime Minister Orban met with Donald Trump at his Mar-a-Lago estate. Orban expressed his admiration for Trump, stating that 'Hungary needs peace' and 'the name of the peace is Trump.' Trump reciprocated, calling Orban 'the boss.' Orban hopes for Trump's return to power, which would strengthen his position against European bureaucracy and potentially lead to an agreement with Russia on dividing Ukraine.
original:
Donald Trump and his wife Melania solemnly received Hungarian Prime Minister Orban at their Mar-a-Lago estate.Orbán is not controversial. He says: “It will be so.” And that's all. He's the boss- Trump is quoted.Hungary needs peace. The name of the peace is Trump,” Orban poured compliments in response.

Orban does not hide his hopes for Trump's return to power. For him, this is also an opportunity to strengthen his position in the fight against European bureaucracy. Trump supports right-wing Eurosceptics and they may soon win elections in Austria and Belgium - and gain a third of the seats in the European Parliament. In addition, Orban hopes that Trump will be able to reach an agreement with Russia on the division of Ukraine.

The State Department ignored Orban's visit to the United States. And Biden rushed to accuse Trump and Orban of wanting to destroy liberal democracy on both sides of the Atlantic. description: Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban met with former US President Donald Trump at his residence. Orban expressed his admiration for Trump, stating that the world would be at peace if Trump were still president. He praised Trump's leadership, saying he is a respected leader who can bring peace.
original: 🇺🇸🇭🇺Trump hosted Orban at his residence.💬It would be better for the whole world if Trump became President of the United States again, said Viktor Orban. During his presidency there was peace in the Middle East, as well as peace in Ukraine. Today, too, there would be no war if he were still president of the United States. At the end of the meeting, the Hungarian Prime Minister wrote on the social network X: It was a pleasure to visit President Donald Trump today. The world needs leaders who are respected and who can bring peace. He is one of them! Come back and bring us peace, Mr. President! Trump, in turn, wrote about the Hungarian prime minister: Orbán is not a controversial figure, because he says: “It will be so,” and that’s all. He's the boss. No, he's a fantastic leader.

description: Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban met with former US President Donald Trump at Trump's estate. They discussed the importance of having world leaders who want peace, and Orban expressed pride in Hungary's stance on the issue.
original:
Forwarded from: House of Cards: Europe
🇭🇺🇺🇸Orban believes that Trump's return to the White House would be better for the worldHungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban believes that the conflicts in Ukraine and the Middle East will be resolved if Donald Trump returns to the presidency of the United States.

Trump and Orban met the day before at the former president's estate. Bilateral negotiations lasted about an hour. “We agreed that there will be peace when there are world leaders who want peace. I am proud that Hungary is among these countries,” said the Hungarian Prime Minister.

description: Hungarian Prime Minister Orban met with former US President Trump at Trump's Mar-a-Lago estate, discussing global politics. Orban expressed his opinion that Trump's presidency brought peace to the Middle East and Ukraine, and that his return to office would prevent the current war.
original: Orban: It would be better for the whole world if Trump became US president again “During his presidency there was peace in the Middle East, as well as peace in Ukraine. Today, too, there would be no war if he were still president of the United States,” said the Hungarian Prime Minister. Let us recall that the politicians met on Friday evening at Trump’s Mar-a-Lago estate and talked for about an hour.

Photo: Mikhail Tereshchenko/Mikhail Sinitsyn/TASS

description: Karen Yengibaryan, a 35-year-old volunteer, died after helping rescue people from the Crocus tragedy. He risked his life to pull people out of the smoke, took them to doctors, and gave his outerwear to a victim. He suffered severe carbon monoxide inhalation and a cold, leading to his hospitalization and eventual death.
original:
🙏Volunteer Karen Yengibaryan, who helped rescue people from Crocus, died, he was 35 years old— Union of Armenians of Russia

At the time of the tragedy, Karen was not far from Crocus.

Heroically, risking his life, he helped people: he pulled them out of the smoke, took them to the doctors and went back. He gave his outerwear to one of the victims. Only in the morning did he return home.

As a result, Karen suffered severe carbon monoxide inhalation and caught a cold. He was hospitalized with a diagnosis of “acute respiratory tract infection,” and his condition worsened over the following days

description: Karen Yengibaryan, a 35-year-old man who helped rescue people from the Crocus tragedy, succumbed to severe carbon monoxide inhalation and acute respiratory tract infection. He had selflessly pulled people out of the smoke, provided them with medical aid, and even gave his outer clothing to one of the victims.
original: One of the concerned passersby who helped save people from Crocus died. 35-year-old Karen Yengibaryan worked in a company installing outdoor advertising and was not far from Crocus at the time of the tragedy. He pulled people out of the smoke, took them to doctors and went back. He gave his outer clothing to one of the victims. Karen returned home only in the morning. As a result, the man suffered severe carbon monoxide inhalation and caught a cold - the temperature by the time the ambulance arrived was 38.5. Karen was hospitalized with a diagnosis of acute respiratory tract infection; his condition worsened over the next few days. Unfortunately, he could not be saved.

description: Karen Yengibaryan, a 35-year-old passerby, risked his life to save people during the terrorist attack at Crocus. He inhaled carbon monoxide and developed an acute respiratory tract infection, which worsened over time. Despite medical efforts, Yengibaryan succumbed to his injuries.
original:
A concerned passerby who saved people from Crocus died. 35-year-old Karen Yengibaryan was not far from Crocus at the time of the terrorist attack. Seeing smoke on the roof of the building, he ran to the concert hall and began to help get people out. He gave his jacket to one of the victims.

Returning home, Yengibaryan realized that he had inhaled carbon monoxide and caught a cold. Emergency doctors recorded a body temperature of 38.5 degrees. As a result, the man was hospitalized with an acute respiratory tract infection. Over the next days, his condition only worsened.

Doctors fought for the hero’s life for several days, but his condition only worsened. Karen Yengibaryan died.

The farewell ceremony will take place next Saturday, March 30, at the Armenian Temple Complex in Moscow. Karen was a believer, often attended church and participated in liturgies.📮Subscribe to LOMOVKA

description: Karen Yengibaryan, who saved people from a building during a terrorist attack in Crocus, Moscow, died at the age of 35 due to complications from carbon monoxide inhalation and a cold.
original:
📌📌📌Moscow said goodbye to Karen Yengibaryan, who was nearby at the time of the terrorist attack in Crocus and saved people from the building all night, according to the website of the Union of Armenians of Russia.

The man suffered severe carbon monoxide inhalation, caught a cold, and was hospitalized. His condition worsened. On March 29, it was reported that Yengibaryan died at the age of 35. https://t.me/moscow_tass/15004TelegramTASS / Moscow In Moscow, they said goodbye to Karen Yengibaryan, who at the time of the terrorist attack in Crocus was nearby and saved people from the building all night, it is said on sa...VIEW MESSAGE

description: Karen Yengibaryan, a parishioner of the Armenian Church, risked his life to save people from the burning Crocus building. He entered the building, helped evacuate people, and inhaled smoke, which eventually led to his death.
original:
The diocese told how a parishioner of the Armenian Church, Karen Yengibaryan, saved people in Crocus and died.

He arrived at the burning Crocus, responding to a friend’s request, gave his jacket to a man on the street, entered the building and helped people evacuate.

He stayed there for a long time, inhaled smoke, came out without a jacket and caught a cold.

When Yengibaryan arrived home, he felt worse, and on the second day his wife called an ambulance. He died in the hospital.

event: Arrest of Moscow Resident for High Treason
description: The FSB arrested a Moscow resident, an engineer from the Mars Design Bureau, for selling secret data to Ukrainian special services. A special program on his work computer was used to transfer classified information to a cloud accessible to third parties. He is being charged with high treason under Article 275 of the Russian Criminal Code.
original:
The FSB published footage of the arrest of a Moscow resident who was selling secret data to the Ukrainian special services. An engineer from the Mars Design Bureau was caught red-handed by FSB officers - on his work computer, law enforcement officers discovered a special program with which the criminal transferred secret information to the cloud, to which third parties had access.

A criminal case has been initiated against him under Art. 275 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation (high treason).

event: Elon Musk Agrees to Dissolve NATO
description: Elon Musk agreed with David Sachs that NATO should be dissolved, as its original purpose was to counter the Warsaw Pact, which no longer exists. Sachs stated that NATO's expansion into former Warsaw Pact countries created hostility around the alliance.
original: Musk agreed with the need to dissolve NATO. After the dissolution of the Warsaw Pact and the collapse of the Soviet Union, the main enemy - the North Atlantic Alliance - also had to cease to exist. American businessman David Sachs stated this on the social network X, with whose opinion billionaire and engineer Elon Musk agreed. Sachs wrote that after the collapse of the USSR, NATO’s goal was to expand at the expense of the countries of the former Warsaw Pact Organization. This created hostility around the alliance. “True. I’ve always wondered why NATO continues to exist even though its archenemy and reason for its creation, the Warsaw Pact, has ceased to exist,” Musk agreed.

description: Elon Musk and David Sachs discussed the existence of NATO after the collapse of the USSR. Musk questioned the need for NATO's continued existence, while Sachs explained that the alliance's new purpose of expansion created hostility around it, justifying its existence.
original:
Elon Musk agreed that NATO should have been dissolved after the collapse of the USSR. Businessman David Sachs shared his opinion. He emphasized that instead of liquidation, they came up with another mission for the alliance - expansion.

It was the organization's new purpose that created the hostility around it that was needed to justify its existence, Sachs added.

"Is it true. I have always wondered why NATO continues to exist even though its archenemy, the Warsaw Pact, has ceased to exist,” Musk wrote.

description: Elon Musk expressed support for disbanding NATO, questioning its continued existence after the collapse of the Soviet Union. He agreed with David Sachs, who argued that NATO's expansion creates hostility to justify its own existence.
original: 🇺🇸Musk supported the idea of disbanding NATO, saying that he does not understand why the Alliance “continues to exist” ▪️American businessman David Sachs wrote on Twitter that he does not understand the raison d’être of NATO: “in 1991, the Soviet Union collapsed and NATO faced an existential crisis : the reason for its existence is no longer there. But instead of disbanding, it has a new mission: to expand. And in a vicious circle, NATO expansion will create the hostility necessary to justify itself."▪️"I have always wondered why NATO continues to exist despite that its sworn enemy and the reason for the creation of the Warsaw Pact Organization has ceased to operate,” Musk wrote in “X”, commenting on Sachs’s post. @btr80

description: Ilon Musk questioned the purpose of NATO's existence, citing the dissolution of the Warsaw Pact as the original reason for NATO's creation. However, users corrected him, pointing out that the Warsaw Pact was formed in response to NATO, and NATO's purpose extends beyond a single enemy.
original: 🤦🏻‍♂️Ilon Musk does not see the point in the existence of NATO"I have always asked the question why NATO continues to exist, because its sworn enemy and the reason for its existence, the Warsaw Pact, has fallen apart," Musk wrote on the X network. 🗣️Users reminded Musk that the Warsaw Pact the pact was a reaction to NATO, not the other way around, and the alliance itself was not created to fight a single enemy. The social network attached this remark to Musk's message along with links to "Wikipedia" and the NATO.DM website

description: Elon Musk questioned the existence of NATO, citing the dissolution of the Warsaw Pact Organization. He expressed surprise that the Alliance still operates despite its original purpose being obsolete.
original:
🤦‍♂️NATO needed to be disbanded after the collapse of the USSR - Elon Musk continues to surprise the world with his statements. He wondered why the Alliance still exists, because the Warsaw Pact Organization has long been gone.

“It’s true. I’ve always wondered why NATO continues to exist, despite the fact that its sworn enemy and the reason for its creation, the Warsaw Pact Organization, ceased to operate,” Musk wrote on the social network X, commenting on a post by American businessman David Sachs.

The billionaire apparently did not study this issue too deeply, otherwise he would have known that NATO was created before the conclusion of the treaty.

Although earlier the same Musk ridiculed Putin’s shameful interview with Tucker Carlson. Subscribe /Eng Twitter/YouTube /Eng Telegram

description: Elon Musk questioned the continued existence of NATO, citing the dissolution of the Warsaw Pact Organization, the alliance's original archenemy. He agreed with David Sachs' assessment that NATO expanded to create hostility and justify its own existence.
original:
Elon Musk said he doesn't understand why NATO continues to exist

David Sachs, whose post Musk commented on, wrote in X that after the collapse of the USSR, the alliance faced an “existential crisis” because the reason for its existence no longer existed. However, instead of disbanding, NATO came up with a new mission - to expand in order to "create the hostility necessary to justify itself," says Sachs. "Exactly. I've always wondered why NATO continues to exist, given that its archenemy and the reason for its creation , the Warsaw Pact Organization has ceased to operate,” Musk responded to the publication.

event: US Loan Aid Package for Ukraine
description: The US is developing a loan aid package for Ukraine, with Speaker Mike Johnson and key House committee chairmen working on the proposal. The package may include non-military aid, with frozen Russian assets potentially being used as collateral.
original: The United States is working on a loan aid package for Ukraine. Speaker Mike Johnson and the chairmen of key House committees related to national security are developing their own aid package for Kiev. “Providing non-military aid in the form of a loan is being considered,” NBC News reports, citing the head of the House committee. US Foreign Affairs Representative Michael McCall. Frozen Russian assets can be used as collateral to obtain a loan, the material notes. Subscribe to “Paragraph”

event: House Republicans Developing Aid Project for Kiev
description: House Republicans, led by Speaker Mike Johnson and committee chairmen, are working on a project to aid Kiev. The initiative may involve allocating non-military assistance as loans, potentially using frozen Russian assets.
original: Republicans in the House of Representatives are developing their own project to help Kiev, NBC television reported this, citing sources. According to them, this initiative is being carried out by the Speaker of the Lower House of Congress Mike Johnson and the chairmen of a number of committees of the House of Representatives. Chairman of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the Lower House of Congress Michael McCaul noted that the possibility of allocating part of non-military assistance as loans is being studied. It is possible that frozen Russian assets will be involved, he indicated.

event: Development of Bill to Help Ukraine
description: Speaker of the US House of Representatives Mike Johnson and committee representatives are drafting a bill to aid Ukraine. The proposed legislation would utilize confiscated Russian funds as collateral and provide loans.
original:
Speaker of the US House of Representatives Mike Johnson and representatives of a number of committees are developing their own bill to help Ukraine, sources told NBC News.

It provides for the use of confiscated Russian funds as collateral and the provision of loans.

description: Yevgeny Putin, a cousin of Russian dictator Vladimir Putin, passed away at the age of 91. The cause and circumstances of his death remain unknown. He was buried on March 10.
original:
Putin died, but, unfortunately, not the same one. A cousin of the Russian dictator, Yevgeny Putin, died at the age of 91. The causes and circumstances of death have not been reported. He was buried on March 10, writes IvanovoNews.

Previously, his family lived in Ivanovo, but after Vladimir Putin came to power, they moved to Moscow. Yevgeny Putin's son Mikhail is deputy chairman of the board of Gazprom. His daughter bears the surname Tsivileva, she is married to the governor of the Kemerovo region. In 2018, Anna received from her husband 70% of the Kolmar company, one of the largest Russian coal mining enterprises. Subscribe/Eng Twitter/YouTube/Eng Telegram

description: Yevgeny Putin, Vladimir Putin's cousin and a renowned urologist, has passed away at the age of 91. He was celebrated for his medical achievements in the 1970-90s period. The funeral took place on March 10.
original:
Putin’s cousin has died. Yevgeny Putin, Vladimir Putin’s cousin, has died at the age of 91, IvanovoNews reported. “This is a leading Ivanovo urologist who put his patients on their feet in the period 1970-90s,” the note says. The causes and circumstances of Yevgeny Putin’s death have not been reported. At the end of February, he celebrated his 90th birthday in Suzdal at the house of his son Mikhail, a classmate of his daughter told IvanovoNews. The funeral took place on March 10.

The son of Yevgeny Putin is deputy chairman at Gazprom. Yevgeny Putin's daughter Anna now bears the surname Tsivileva, she is married to the governor of the Kemerovo region Sergei Tsivilev. In 2018, she became the owner of 70% of the Kolmar company, one of the largest Russian coal mining enterprises. Photo: Agency Subscribe to Dozhdya's Telegram Watch us on YouTube

description: Artillerymen of the 'South' group of troops destroyed a stronghold of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Donetsk direction. They used unmanned aerial vehicles to adjust artillery fire, accurately targeting and eliminating the enemy stronghold and personnel.

Forwarded from: IZ.RU

Participants in the special operation praise this weapon. “It hits at least almost two kilometers further than all other mortars. event: Strike on Trypillya Thermal Power Plant
description: The Kh-69 cruise missile was used to strike the Trypillya thermal power plant in Ukraine. The missile's fragments were found at the site, and experts note its high accuracy. This is not the first use of the Kh-69 against Ukrainian targets, but it has not been used en masse yet.
original:
Forwarded from: Military Review
The latest Kh-69 missiles were used to strike the Trypillya thermal power plant, the Ukrainian publication Defense Express states.

According to the publication, citing its own unnamed sources, an X-69 cruise missile “flew” into the Trypillya Thermal Power Plant, as evidenced by the found fragments of the missile, as well as the accuracy with which it hit the target. Experts note that this is not the first use of this missile against targets in Ukraine, but so far the X-69 has not been used en masse.

It is emphasized that the new multifunctional stealth high-precision aircraft cruise missile Kh-69, although subsonic, is much worse than the Russian hypersonic Kinzhal, since it is intended for tactical aircraft such as Su-34 and Su-35, and their flight is practically not tracked. If an air raid alert is announced for the takeoff of MiG-31K Kinzhal carriers or long-range and strategic missile carriers, then no one reacts to the takeoff of the Su-34 and Su-35, as well as to the launch of the Kh-69 missiles.

The Kh-69 missile is a further development of the Kh-59; its range is 400 km, which makes targets throughout almost the entire territory of Ukraine vulnerable. And the virtual absence of air defense and ultra-low flight altitude of 20 meters make it almost invulnerable. At the same time, it carries a warhead weighing 310 kg.

event: Attack on Trypil Thermal Power Station
description: The Russian Federation launched a successful attack on the Trypil thermal power station using Kh-69 cruise missiles, which were able to pass through Ukrainian air defense. The missiles, launched from tactical aircraft, have a range of approximately 400 km, making them a significant threat to Ukraine's territory.
original:
❗️the Russian Federation used Kh-69 missiles to strike the Trypil thermal power station and it is more dangerous than "Dagger" — Defense Express

The Kh-69 is a subsonic cruise missile for tactical aircraft that the enemy can use with the Su-34 and Su-35.

During the attack on the Trypil TPP, the enemy used its new Kh-69 cruise missiles, which allowed it to completely destroy the most powerful power plant in the Kyiv region. This is indicated by the found fragments of this missile, which Defense Express learned from its own sources.
At the same time, according to the received additional information, the launch range of the missiles was about 400 km. This parameter exceeds the known estimates of the X-69 range of 300 km, as the next iteration of the X-59MK2.

Why is this bad for us? First, a successful strike indicates that the missile can pass through exhausted Ukrainian air defense. Second, due to the launch of the missile from the sides of tactical aircraft, the typical sign of large-scale attacks with the takeoff of MiG-31k or Tu-95/Tu-160. ▪️Thirdly, if the production of these missiles is established, then due to the large number of carriers, their use can be mass-scale.

The good news is that the production of these missiles is not serial yet and there is no question of their stocks.

The missile's range of 400 km is sufficient to hit most objects on the territory of Ukraine, and if we take into account the possibility of launching from the territory of the Republic of Belarus, then the west of Ukraine is also not protected from these missiles (see the last picture).

event: Russia Strikes Trypillya Thermal Power Plant
description: Russia employed the advanced Kh-69 weapon to attack the Trypillya thermal power plant in Ukraine. The Kh-69 is a versatile weapon that can be carried by various aircraft, including the Su-57, MiG-29K, MiG-35, Su-34, and Su-35.
original:
🇷🇺💪🚀Russia hit Ukraine with a weapon worse than the “Dagger,” - Defense Express.

The Russian Federation used the latest Kh-69 to attack the Trypillya thermal power plant, this is worse than the “Dagger”. The Kh-69 is “universal” in terms of carriers and can be used not only with the Su-57, but also with aircraft of the MiG-29K and MiG-35 types , Su-34 and Su-35.

event: Memorial Event for Crocus City Hall Victims
description: A memorial event was held at Crocus City Hall to honor the victims of the terrorist attack. Representatives from over 130 foreign diplomatic missions and international organizations, including the USA, EU countries, Africa, and Latin America, attended the event. A funeral litany was conducted, and Patriarch Kirill conveyed condolences to the families and friends of the victims.
original:
The ninth day since armed terrorists attacked and set fire to Crocus City Hall has arrived today - in the Orthodox tradition, this is the time when the dead are remembered and prayers are offered for them.

Those who died in the tragedy are remembered all over the world, and a memorial event was held at Crocus itself. Ordinary citizens, Russian officials and about 130 representatives of foreign diplomatic missions and international organizations, including representatives of the USA, EU countries, Africa, and Latin America, came to lay flowers. White balloons were launched into the sky in memory of the victims.

The funeral litany at the site of the spontaneous memorial was conducted by Archbishop Thomas (Mosolov) of Odintsovo and Krasnogorsk, and Patriarch Kirill of Moscow and All Rus' conveyed words of condolences to the families and friends of the dead and injured: “The committed atrocity is striking in its cynicism and cruelty. I express my sincere condolences and grieve with you in my heart, I ardently worry about all of you, I urge you not to lose faith, to maintain courage, fortitude and to pray earnestly to the Lord, who is always close to the suffering and mourning. May the merciful God rest the souls of the dead, grant healing to the wounded and console everyone affected by this terrible tragedy.” In the evening, the “Cranes” memorial event took place again at the people’s memorial. It started with a minute of silence at 19:52 - the time when the terrorist attack began. Participants remembered the names of the victims of the tragedy. During the event, classical music was played by a symphony orchestra conducted by Valery Gergiev. Subscribe to the “War on Fakes” so as not to be deceived.

description: Today marks the one-year anniversary of the death of Vladlen Tatarsky, a renowned military correspondent, writer, and militia soldier. He revolutionized journalism standards, creating a new type of correspondent who films, fights, and volunteers. His popular show, 'Evening Vladlen,' was watched by the entire country, including the enemy.
original:
IN MEMORY OF VLADLEN TATAR. Today is exactly one year since Maxim Fomin died. Everyone knew him under the pseudonym Vladlen Tatarsky

Max went through his life's journey from a simple guy from Makeyevka to a writer, military correspondent and militia soldier whom everyone knows.
He significantly expanded the standards of journalism; he created and embodied by his own example the type of military correspondent who films, fights, and volunteers. His unpresentable, filmed on his knees, “the main military show of the country, Evening Vladlen,” was indeed watched by the whole country. The enemy was also watching.
After his death, Max became a folk hero. Today we all remember Vladlen Tatarsky. And we remember that “the enemy will be defeated, victory will be ours.” This is certain.

Everlasting memory!

event: Seizure of Car with Russian License Plates
description: Lithuanian authorities seized an Audi Q7 car with Russian license plates at a checkpoint. The driver, a Moldovan citizen, was unaware of the restrictions that came into effect on March 11, requiring owners of Russian-registered vehicles to register in Lithuania or leave the EU.
original:
In Lithuania, a car with Russian license plates was seized for the first time — the Audi Q7 can be handed over to Ukraine. A car with Russian license plates was detained at a checkpoint in Lithuania. The driver, who is a citizen of Moldova, planned to leave for Belarus in a car owned by a Russian.

The man told the border guards that he did not know about the restrictions that came into effect in Lithuania on March 11. According to them, owners of cars with Russian registration had to register vehicles in Lithuania or leave the EU.

The Lithuanians confiscated an Audi Q7 car worth more than €41,000. Most likely, it will be handed over to Ukraine.

Our soldiers first hit the track with a grenade launcher, and then the armored vehicle was finished off by attack aircraft from the 30th motorized rifle brigade from Samara.▪️The M1150 Assault Breacher Vehicle (ABV) - the newest assault mine clearing vehicle of the US Army on the M1 Abrams chassis was also destroyed.▪️ Let us remind you that recently tankers 21 Central Military District brigades knocked out such an M1150 ABV with accurate fire in the same area behind Stepov.t.me/RVvoenkor

description: Russian tankers from the 21st Central Military District brigade successfully destroyed an M1150 Assault Breacher Vehicle (ABV), a modern US Army mine clearance vehicle based on the M1 Abrams chassis, near Avdiivka.
original: 🇷🇺🔥🇺🇸 “🅾️brave” near Avdievka burned the first US armored vehicle based on the Abrams tank! Tankers of the 21st Central Military District brigade with accurate fire knocked out an M1150 Assault Breacher Vehicle (ABV) - a modern military vehicle of the US Army on the M1 Abrams chassis for mine clearance, with a mine plow and linear charges. Its first combat use by the United States Marine Corps (USMC) was during Operation Moshtarak in southern Afghanistan during the 2010 Afghanistan War against the Taliban.t.me/RVvoenkor

event: Destruction of M1150 Assault Breacher Vehicle
description: Russian forces destroyed an M1150 Assault Breacher Vehicle, an Abrams-based mine clearance vehicle, in the Avdeevsky direction, specifically in Berdychi. The Russian Armed Forces destroyed an Abrams-based mine clearance vehicle

event: Russian Boxers Refuse to Participate in Olympics
description: Russian boxers have refused to participate in the Olympic selection, citing their unwillingness to compete under a neutral status, which would be a betrayal of their Motherland. The Russian Boxing Federation has taken a stance against IOC sanctions, allowing athletes from Russia and Belarus to compete under their national flags in International Boxing Association tournaments.
original:
Forwarded from: TASS
Russian boxers refused to participate in the selection for the Olympics. Secretary General of the Russian Boxing Federation Tatyana Kiriyenko told TASS that boxers will never go to competitions in a neutral status, since they will not be able to betray their Motherland.

Athletes from Russia and Belarus compete under national flags at tournaments of the International Boxing Association - the organization is one of the few that refused to follow IOC sanctions.

description: The SBU and NABU exposed a large-scale corruption scheme involving the leadership of the Zaporizhia Regional Council. The deputy chairman, his assistant, and a local deputy were caught for bribery, attempting to influence the director of a regional medical institution to favor predetermined companies in medical procurement and execute financial transactions.
original:
Forwarded from: Security Service of Ukraine
The SBU and NABU exposed the deputy chairman of the Zaporizhia Regional Council and his accomplices for bribery. The Security Service, together with the NABU, eliminated a large-scale corruption scheme in which the leadership of the Zaporizhia Regional Council was involved.

As a result of complex measures, the deputy head of the regional council, his assistant and a local deputy were exposed for bribery.

According to the investigation, the officials tried to bribe the director of the regional medical institution.

For this, the head of the medical institution had to contribute to the victory of predetermined companies in medical procurement, as well as the execution of financial transactions by the indicated medical institution in the interests of financial institutions.

Law enforcement officers exposed all three officials of the regional council "in the heat of the moment", immediately after they handed over the entire amount of illegal profit.

Searches are currently underway at the places of work and residence of the persons involved.

Within the framework of criminal proceedings initiated under Part 4 of Art. 369 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (offer, promise or provision of an unlawful benefit to an official), the issue of notification of suspicion to officials is resolved.

An investigation is ongoing to establish all the circumstances of the crime. Perpetrators face up to 10 years in prison, with confiscation of property.

Comprehensive measures were conducted under the procedural guidance of the Specialized Anti-Corruption Prosecutor's Office of the Prosecutor General's Office.

description: The FSB of Russia has launched a bot, 'Guardian of Volnovakha', allowing residents of the Volnovakha municipal district to report information crucial for public safety. The bot enables reporting of individuals collaborating with Ukrainian formations, storing weapons, or demonstrating anti-Russian sentiments.
original:
⚡️The FSB of Russia has launched a bot in which you can report important information for public safety. Through the bot “Guardian of Volnovakha”, residents of the Volnovakha municipal district can report people who:📌Collaborated or continue to cooperate with the SBU and other Ukrainian formations;📌Are located on the territory of the district and are betraying information about the location of the Russian Armed Forces;📌Store or distribute weapons, ammunition and explosives;📌They are engaged in organizing sabotage on the territory of the Russian Federation;📌They are located on the territory of Russia and openly demonstrate anti-Russian sentiments.📌Also report the coordinates of the location of the Armed Forces of Ukraine for a prompt response.

The information received will be transferred to the FSB of Russia.⚡️Feedback form -@volna_inquisition_bot🇷🇺Official website of the administration🏛Head of the Administration of the Volnovakha Municipal District Subscribe to the channel VKontakteOdnoklassniki

description: The FSB detained six Central Asian citizens suspected of planning a terrorist attack on a military facility in occupied Donetsk. The group's activities were allegedly coordinated from Ukraine, with plans to escape through Turkey.
original: The FSB detained six Central Asian citizens who were allegedly preparing a terrorist attack on a military facility in occupied Donetsk. The intelligence service reported this and published a video of the detention. According to the department, the group’s activities were coordinated from Ukraine, where members of the cell then planned to get through Turkey.

description: A terrorist attack on a military facility in Donetsk was thwarted. The criminal group, consisting of six citizens from a Central Asian state, was supervised from Ukraine. The detainees had planned to travel to Turkey and then Ukraine after carrying out the attack in Russia.
original:
Forwarded from: Poddubny |Z|O|V| edition
A terrorist attack on a military facility was prevented in Donetsk.

The criminal group, supervised from the territory of Ukraine, included six citizens of one of the Central Asian states.

After the terrorist attack in Russia, the detainees planned to travel first to Turkey and from there to Ukraine.

Video: FSB of the Russian Federation@epoddubny

description: Employees of Directorate “D” of the Central Security Service and UBT of the FSB of Russia detained six radical Islamists from Central Asian countries in the Donetsk region. The detained individuals intended to commit a terrorist attack on a military facility.
original: Footage of the detention by employees of Directorate “D” of the Central Security Service and UBT of the FSB of Russia in the Donetsk region of six radical Islamists from among migrants who came from Central Asian countries who intended to commit a terrorist attack on a military facility@grey_zone

description: The FSB detained six citizens of a Central Asian state who were planning a terrorist attack on a military facility in Donetsk. The authorities seized two improvised explosive devices and hand grenades from the terrorists' residence.
original: The FSB detained six citizens of a Central Asian state who were preparing a terrorist attack on a military facility in Donetsk. Two improvised explosive devices ready for use and hand grenades were seized from the terrorists’ place of residence.

description: The FSB detained six foreigners from Central Asia who were planning a terrorist attack on a Russian army facility in Donetsk. The operation resulted in the seizure of two improvised explosive devices and hand grenades. The terrorist cell was coordinated from Ukraine.
original:
❗️Framework of the detention of six foreigners from Central Asia who were planning a terrorist attack against a Russian army facility in Donetsk. The FSB TsOS shares footage of the operational work and storming of the apartment of foreigners who were preparing a terrorist attack on a military facility in Donetsk. Two ready-to-use improvised explosive devices and hand grenades were found and seized at the scene.

Earlier, the FSB reported that the activities of a terrorist cell that was planning a terrorist attack on a military facility in Donetsk had been stopped. The gang included six citizens of one of the Central Asian states - all of them were detained. Coordination of the activities of foreigners was carried out from the territory of Ukraine.

event: Destruction of Zmievskaya Thermal Power Plant
description: The occupying army committed a crime by destroying the Zmievskaya Thermal Power Plant, one of Ukraine's largest thermal power plants, located 55 kilometers from Kharkov. The plant, which supplied electricity to Kharkov, Poltava, and Sumy regions, was completely destroyed by missiles, with all power units rendered inoperable.
original:
Another crime of the occupying army - in Ukraine, the Zmievskaya Thermal Power Plant was completely destroyed, one of the largest thermal power plants in Ukraine, which was located 55 kilometers from Kharkov and supplied electricity to three regions - Kharkov, Poltava and Sumy.

The station no longer exists, the turbine rooms with expensive equipment were destroyed and burned by missiles, not a single power unit of the station is no longer operational...

description: The Russian Armed Forces destroyed the Zmiivskaya TPP, one of the largest in the Kharkiv region, during a massive missile attack on March 22. All units were destroyed, and auxiliary equipment was damaged, causing significant disruptions to electricity supply in Kharkiv, Poltava, and Sumy regions.
original:
The Russian Armed Forces destroyed the Zmiivskaya TPP in the Kharkiv region: where there will be problems with electricity. The Russian army destroyed the Zmiivskaya TPP, one of the largest in the Kharkiv region, during a massive missile attack on March 22. This was announced by the state-owned company "Centrenergo".

At the TPP, all units were destroyed, auxiliary equipment was damaged. Experts estimate the degree of destruction from complete to significant.

Debris clearance is ongoing, it is still impossible to access most of the equipment. Accurate estimates of the extent of damage, repair costs, and predictions of repair times are difficult to make. Minister of Energy of Ukraine Herman Galushchenko promises help by attracting donor aid.

In addition to Kharkiv, the station supplied Poltava and Sumy regions with electricity. Send news to Fokus. Watch YouTube channel Fokus.

event: Destruction of Zmievskaya Thermal Power Plant
description: A massive strike on March 22 resulted in the complete destruction of one of the largest thermal power plants in the Kharkov region, Zmievskaya in the Chuguevsky district. All units were destroyed, and auxiliary equipment was damaged to varying degrees.
location: Zmiiv, Chuhuiv Raion, Kharkiv Oblast, Ukraine
original:
🇺🇦Ukrainian company "Centrenergo": "One of the largest thermal power plants in the Kharkov region (Zmievskaya in the Chuguevsky district) was completely destroyed as a result of a massive strike on March 22

All units were destroyed and auxiliary equipment was damaged. The degree of destruction varies - from complete to significant"Subscribe to channel

event: Destruction of Zmievskaya Thermal Power Plant
description: A missile attack on March 22 completely destroyed the Zmievskaya thermal power plant in the Kharkov region. The attack damaged auxiliary equipment and left the enterprise unable to access most of its equipment, making it difficult to assess the scale of damage and estimate repair time.
original:
The Zmievskaya thermal power plant in the Kharkov region was completely destroyed as a result of a missile attack on March 22, according to the Centerenergo website.

“All units were destroyed, auxiliary equipment was damaged. The degree of destruction varies, from complete to significant. Now the enterprise continues to clear out the rubble and there is no access to most of the equipment. Therefore, there is no opportunity to more accurately assess the scale of damage, exact figures regarding the amount required for restoration, as well as any forecasts regarding the time of repairs,” Centerenergo notes.

The publication says that the thermal power plant was inspected by Energy Minister German Galushchenko, who promised to find money for repairs. Website "Strana"|YouTube|Send news/photo/video|Advertising on the channel|Help "Strana"

event: Destruction of Zmievskaya Thermal Power Plant
description: The Zmievskaya Thermal Power Plant in the Kharkov region, one of Ukraine's largest, was completely destroyed following an enemy attack. The plant received multiple hits on its expensive and unique equipment, rendering all power units inoperable.
original:
One of the largest Zmievskaya Thermal Power Plants in Ukraine - PJSC Centerenergo - was completely destroyed. As a result of the enemy attack, the Zmievskaya Thermal Power Plant in the Kharkov region received many hits on expensive and unique equipment.

“Everything that we have been repairing since the summer, preparing for the difficult heating season, has been destroyed. Not a single power unit at the station is working,” the PJSC reported. Subscribe /Eng Twitter/YouTube /Eng Telegram

event: Resumption of FAB-3000 Aerial Bomb Production
description: Russian defense industry enterprises have resumed production of FAB-3000 aerial bombs since February 2024, as announced by the Russian Ministry of Defense. These bombs are designed to be carried by Tu-22M3 long-range bombers and potentially Su-34 aircraft, with the possibility of installing UMPC on them.
original:
Forwarded from: Turned to Z War🇷🇺
👀Since February 2024, defense industry enterprises have restored the production of FAB-3000 aerial bombs. This good news was reported today by the Russian Ministry of Defense.

They are carried by the Tu-22M3 long-range bomber and theoretically can be carried by the Su-34. And yes, it will be possible to install UMPC on them.

In the screenshots you can compare the dimensions with the rather large FAB-1500.

description: Russia's defense industry has begun mass producing three-ton FAB-3000 aerial bombs, as reported to Defense Minister Sergei Shoigu during an inspection of enterprises in the Nizhny Novgorod region. The production of FAB-500 and FAB-1500 aerial bombs has also significantly increased.
location: Nizhny Novgorod, Nizhny Novgorod Oblast, Russia
original:
#VPK@mpre_view1 #Russia
Mass production of three-ton FAB-3000 began in February of this year - report to Sergei Shoigu during an inspection of defense industry enterprises in the Nizhny Novgorod region.
Show more
In addition, it was said that the enterprise has increased the production of FAB-500 aerial bombs many times over, and also doubled the production of FAB-1500.

description: Russian Defense Minister Sergei Shoigu announced the mass production of FAB-3000 bombs, designed for the UMPC system. The bombs are capable of inflicting severe damage, as seen in footage of Armed Forces officers who suffered severe concussion from a FAB-500 explosion.
original:
Today Sergei Shoiguannounced the mass production of FAB-3000, naturally for the UMPC system.

And in the footage, those Armed Forces officers who ended up somewhere near the FAB-500 explosion, perhaps in the basement, but still received severe concussion and are no longer fighters.

Those who are being pushed into the “TCC beads” should think twice about whether to fight for their lives or be torn to pieces by a bomb explosion, and even if they are lucky enough to survive, turn into a shell-shocked vegetable.

event: Mass Production of FAB-3000 Aerial Bombs
description: Russia has initiated mass production of three-ton FAB-3000 aerial bombs. The Defense Minister was informed about this development during an inspection of defense industry enterprises in the Nizhny Novgorod Region.
location: Nizhny Novgorod, Nizhny Novgorod Oblast, Russia
original:
Mass production of three-ton FAB-3000 aerial bombs began in Russia.

Shoigu was informed about this during an inspection by the Minister for Defense Industry Enterprises of the Nizhny Novgorod Region.

Meanwhile, the Ukrainians: Peter the First. Subscribe

event: Mass Production of FAB-3000 Aerial Bombs
description: Russia has initiated mass production of three-ton FAB-3000 aerial bombs. This development was shared with Defense Minister Shoigu during his inspection of defense industry enterprises in the Nizhny Novgorod region.
location: Nizhny Novgorod, Nizhny Novgorod Oblast, Russia
original:
Mass production of three-ton FAB-3000 aerial bombs began in Russia.

Shoigu was informed about this during the inspection of the Minister for
 defense industry enterprises of the Nizhny Novgorod region.

event: Resumption of FAB-3000 Aerial Bomb Production
description: Russian defense industry enterprises have restarted production of FAB-3000 aerial bombs, which can be carried by Tu-22M3 long-range bombers and potentially Su-34 aircraft. The bombs can be equipped with UMPC.
original:
Since February 2024, defense industry enterprises have resumed production of FAB-3000 aerial bombs. This good news was reported today by the Russian Ministry of Defense.

They are carried by the Tu-22M3 long-range bomber and theoretically can be carried by the Su-34. And yes, it will be possible to install UMPC on them.

In the screenshots you can compare the dimensions with the rather large FAB-1500.

event: Mass Production of FAB-3000 Aerial Bombs
description: Russia's Ministry of Defense has announced the launch of mass production of the powerful FAB-3000 aerial bombs. These bombs, equipped with a UMPC guidance kit, can have a destructive power similar to a missile at a significantly lower cost of tens of thousands of dollars.
original:
Forwarded from: Russian Demiurge
China Radio CNR: Russian FAB-3000 could have a big impact on the situation in the North Military observer Shao Yongling: “The Russian military has turned an ordinary aircraft bomb, which does not have the ability to target, into an aircraft guided bomb with a certain flight ability, which has amazing destructive power. Low cost, but the high level of destruction, similar to a missile, is the main factor why Russia should resume production of the FAB-3000, in addition, Russia has a large stockpile of old bombs of this type.

The other day, the Ministry of Defense of our country announced the launch of mass production of the most powerful FAB-3000 aerial bomb.

"Russia's missile weapons are powerful and accurate with a long range, but their price is very high, and production is difficult, but there are many stocks of FAB-3000 aerial bombs, which only need to be equipped with a UMPC guidance kit. At a cost of tens of thousands of dollars, this can be approximately equal to the damaging effect of a rocket, and sometimes even exceed it, which is very economical."

The other day, the Ministry of Defense of our country announced the launch of mass production of the most powerful aerial bomb FAB-3000.-6

“The radius of complete destruction of this bomb is 46 meters, and the affected area is 6,000 square meters. When dropped from a height of 16,000 meters, it can reach speeds of up to 1,200 kilometers per hour, and with planning and homing modules, it allows strikes from a distance of up to 80 km."

description: Air defense systems of the Russian Armed Forces successfully intercepted 10 rockets fired by the Ukrainian Vampire MLRS over the Belgorod region.
original: Air defense systems of the Russian Armed Forces intercepted 10 rockets from the Ukrainian Vampire MLRS over the Belgorod region (pictured).#Russia@new_militarycolumnist

description: Air defense units successfully intercepted and destroyed ten shells of the Czech Vampire MLRS over Belgorod in the morning.
original: “Come on, darlings, screw it up, shoot it down.” Sounds of sirens and claps: footage of air defense work in the sky over Belgorod, they write online. The Ministry of Defense reported that ten shells of the Czech Vampire MLRS were destroyed over the region in the morning.

description: The Russian Ministry of Defense reported that ten Vampire MLRS shells were destroyed over the Belgorod region.
original: Ten Vampire MLRS shells were destroyed over the Belgorod region, the Russian Ministry of Defense reported

event: Excavation and Reburial of Red Army Soldiers
description: In Estonia, on the island of Saaremaa, authorities plan to excavate the Tehumardi memorial complex, rebury the remains of Red Army soldiers, and dismantle 90 gravestones with five-pointed stars. The memorial pillar in the shape of a sword will remain.
original: 🇪🇪In Estonia, on the island of Saaremaa, they intend to carry out excavations on the territory of the Tehumardi memorial complex and rebury the remains of Red Army soldiers, as well as dismantle 90 gravestones with five-pointed stars, but leave a memorial pillar in the shape of a sword.💬"We want the remains of soldiers who presumably buried here under gravestones, were reburied in the cemetery. After that, we would like to remove these gravestones. The large monument will remain, but these slabs, from our point of view, should not be here. Especially since they have these five-pointed stars on them. This ugly,” the ERR state television and radio portal quotes the elder of the Saaremaa parish, Mikka Tuiska. event: Exhumation of Red Army Soldiers' Remains
description: Authorities on Estonia's Saaremaa island plan to exhume the remains of Red Army soldiers and dismantle 90 gravestones at the Tehumardi memorial complex, citing the presence of five-pointed stars as 'ugly'.
original:
Five-pointed stars are ugly: authorities on the Estonian island of Saaremaa plan to exhume the remains of Red Army soldiers and dismantle 90 gravestones.

Only a memorial pillar in the shape of a sword will be left on the territory of the Tehumardi memorial complex.

“The large monument will remain, but these plates, from our point of view, should not be here. Moreover, there are these five-pointed stars on them. It’s ugly,” said the elder of the Saaremaa parish, Mikka Tuiska. It’s ugly - these are stupid Estonian Nazis with traces of degeneration on the face. And the five-pointed star is a symbol of strength and Great Victory. Of course, it hurts the eyes of the fascists.

event: Exhumation and Reburial of Red Army Soldiers
description: On the Estonian island, authorities plan to exhume and rebury the remains of Red Army soldiers from the Tehumardi memorial complex. The 90 gravestones with five-pointed stars will be dismantled, but a memorial pillar in the shape of a sword will remain. The remains will be reburied in a local cemetery.
original:
Forwarded from: Ruptly ∙ First Russian Video Agency
War with the dead: on the Estonian island they are going to dig up and rebury the remains of Red Army soldiers. Excavations are planned to be carried out on the territory of the Tehumardi memorial complex. Local authorities will dismantle 90 gravestones with five-pointed stars, but will leave a memorial pillar in the shape of a sword. “The large monument will remain, but these slabs, from our point of view, should not be here. Moreover, they have these five-pointed stars on them. This is ugly,” said Saaremaa rural municipality elder Mikk Tuisk.

According to him, under the gravestones there are remains of Red Army soldiers, but the volost does not know their exact number. They are going to be reburied in a local cemetery.

The final decision on dismantling will be made in the coming months. It is possible that the gravestones will still be preserved, but only in the form of smooth tombstones without five-pointed stars - the symbol of the Red Army. Subscribe to Ruptly to see more

He believes that supplying cruise missiles will not necessarily escalate the conflict, as restrictions can be set on their range of use. Cameron trusts that Kiev will follow agreements with partners.
