event: British Foreign Minister's Statement on Missile Supply
description: British Foreign Minister Cameron expressed willingness to help Germany resolve issues hindering the supply of Taurus missiles to Ukraine. He also proposed buying German missiles and transferring British Storm Shadow missiles to Ukraine, with potential restrictions to avoid escalation.
original:
🇬🇧🇩🇪🇺🇦British Foreign Minister Cameron was worried about his clowns in Kyiv: “London is ready to help Berlin in solving problems that are preventing the supply of Taurus missiles to Kiev, or consider the option of buying German missiles and transferring British Storm Shadow to Ukraine

In the case of using these missiles, restrictions can be imposed that will help avoid escalation."His concept of "avoiding escalation" is funny. Subscribe to the channel

event: London Offers Help to Berlin on Taurus Cruise Missiles
description: British Foreign Secretary David Cameron expressed London's willingness to assist Berlin in supplying Taurus cruise missiles to Ukraine. The proposed solution involves Germany providing Taurus missiles to the UK, which would then supply additional Storm Shadow missiles to Ukraine.
original: London is ready to help Berlin solve the problem with the supply of Taurus cruise missiles to Ukraine. As British Foreign Secretary David Cameron said in an interview with Sueddeutsche Zeitung, Germany can supply Taurus cruise missiles to the UK, and London can supply additional Storm Shadow missiles to Ukraine.

event: Britain's Plan to Supply Ukraine with Storm Shadow Missiles
description: British Minister David Cameron proposed a deal where Germany would supply Taurus missiles to Britain, and in return, Britain would provide Ukraine with additional Storm Shadow missiles.
original:
​​🚀Britain wants to get Taurus to give Ukraine more Storm Shadow

The idea of ​​British Minister David Cameron was that Germany could supply Taurus to Britain, and the British government would provide Ukraine with additional Storm Shadow missiles in return.

Cameron rejected fears that the supply of cruise missiles could lead to an escalation of the war in Ukraine 🔻subscribe

event: UK to Provide Taurus Missiles to Ukraine
description: The UK has agreed to purchase German Taurus missiles and transfer its Storm Shadow missiles to Ukraine. British Foreign Minister David Cameron stated that the UK is willing to consider other options to help Berlin overcome obstacles in supplying Taurus missiles to Kyiv, with certain restrictions to avoid escalation.
original:
❗️London agrees to buy German Taurus missiles and transfer its Storm Shadow to Ukraine. British Foreign Minister David Cameron stated this in an interview with the Sueddeutsche Zeitung newspaper.

He also noted that the British authorities are ready to consider other options for helping Berlin in solving problems that are preventing the supply of Taurus missiles to Kyiv.

At the same time, Cameron assured that if these missiles are used, certain restrictions can be imposed that will “avoid escalation.”

event: Attack on Ukrainian Air Defense Convoy
description: New footage confirms that the Russian Armed Forces successfully targeted a convoy of Ukrainian air defense systems west of Pokrovsk, destroying three MIM-104 Patriot air defense system vehicles. The attack was precise, with characteristic details such as the MAN KAT1 8x8 trucks serving as the base for Patriot launchers identified among the debris.
original:
Forwarded from: Fisherman
❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦New footage of objective monitoring of the attack on a convoy of Ukrainian air defense systems west of Pokrovsk allows us to unequivocally state that the Russian Armed Forces hit precisely the vehicles from the MIM-104 Patriot air defense system. This is indicated by characteristic details: in particular, among the piles of debris, cabs of MAN KAT1 8x8 trucks can be identified, which act as the base for Patriot launchers.

In total, as a result of the arrival, three machines from the complex were immediately destroyed. So the scouts, fire vehicle and drone operators can definitely be congratulated with another very large catch.#Donetsk#Pokrovsk#Russia#Ukraine@rybarSupport us

event: Destruction of Patriot Air Defense System
description: Russian forces confirmed the destruction of American Patriot air defense system launchers near Sergeevka. Analysts identified the MIM-104 Patriot missile defense system and the MAN KAT1 truck in the destroyed air defense system.
original: 🇷🇺🔥🇺🇸The first confirmed destruction of the launchers of the American Patriot air defense system near Sergeevka.▪️Despite the caption to the Ministry of Defense video about the destruction of the S-300, analysts in Ukraine and Russia identified the MIM-104 Patriot missile defense system and the MAN KAT1 truck in the destroyed air defense system. ▪️ “The loss of launchers or radars cannot be compared with the loss of a crew that has been training, working and serving for years,” Ukrainian military officers complain. Source-t.me/RVvoenkorP.S. There is now different information about the number of affected launchers: from two to three.

event: Destruction of Patriot Air Defense System
description: Russian troops successfully destroyed a Ukrainian Armed Forces anti-aircraft missile system, specifically a MIM-104 Patriot launcher, near Pokrovsk using an Iskander ballistic missile strike. The attack showcased high reconnaissance capabilities and efficiency in inflicting fire damage.
original:
Forwarded from: Fisherman
❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦Destruction of the Patriot air defense system near Pokrovsk In the morning, the Russian Ministry of Defense published footage of the destruction of the Ukrainian Armed Forces anti-aircraft missile system by an Iskander ballistic missile strike. A column of cars was hit near the village of Sergeev, just west of Pokrovsk (Krasnoarmeysk): a powerful explosion occurred, characteristic of the detonation of rocket fuel. Coordinates: 48.2975341, 36.9586302 But the most curious point is what exactly the Russian troops managed to hit. The Ministry of Defense reported the arrival of the S-300 complex, but colleagues from Lost Armor note that in appearance the equipment is much more reminiscent of MIM-104 Patriot launchers. This is also indicated by the use of corresponding semi-trailers.

In any case, this is a clear success for the Russian troops. Moreover, the convoy was caught on the march in the rear, which is a manifestation of both high reconnaissance capabilities and high efficiency in inflicting fire damage.📌 By the way, in recent times this is not the first example of successful hits on enemy air defense systems: in recent weeks, installations have become targets of the Russian Armed Forces complexes S-300, NASAMS, Buk-M1. Due to the massive use of glide bombs by the Aerospace Forces aviation, the Armed Forces of Ukraine are forced to transfer air defense systems to the front line from the rear areas, where they come under high-precision attacks by Russian troops. UPD. New footage of the results of the arrival make it possible to clearly determine that during the attack there was It was the ZRSMIM-104 Patriot that was destroyed. High-resolution infographicsEnglish versionIf you, your loved ones and relatives have information about damaged objects, enemy movements, or any other sensitive information that can help our troops, feel free to write to our bot@rybar_feedback_bot. We guarantee confidentiality. #Donetsk#Pokrovsk#Russia#Ukraine@rybarSupport us

description: President Zelenskyi's family earned UAH 12.5 million in 2023, primarily from wages, bank interest, and rental income. The increase in income compared to 2022 was due to the resumption of rent payments.
original:
President Zelenskyi released a declaration for 2023 - last year the family of the head of state earned almost UAH 12.5 million.

It is noted that the income of Zelenskyi's family in 2023 mainly consisted of wages, bank interest and income from providing real estate for rent. In total, this amount was 4 million 967 thousand 036 hryvnias.

And the increase in income compared to last year in 2022 was due to the resumption of rent payments.

The remaining funds of the Zelenskyi family at the end of 2023 decreased by almost UAH 2.8 million 🔻subscribe

description: Ukrainian President Zelensky published his declaration for 2023, revealing the income of his family. The majority of their income came from salaries, bank interest, and rental income from real estate, totaling 12,423,008 UAH.
original: Zelensky published his declaration for 2023. The income of the Zelensky family in 2023 consisted mainly of salaries, bank interest and income from the provision of real estate for rent. In total, this amount amounted to 12,423,008 UAH. Ukraine 24/7

description: Ukrainian President Zelensky announced his income declaration for 2023, revealing a total income of UAH 12 million 423 thousand 008, including UAH 7 million 455 thousand 972 from government bond sales. The income mainly consisted of wages, bank interest, and rental income.
original:
Zelensky announced a declaration for 2023.

According to the declaration, the income of the president and his family members amounted to UAH 12 million 423 thousand 008, including income from the sale of government bonds - UAH 7 million 455 thousand 972.

The income of the Zelensky family in 2023, according to the Office of the President, mainly consisted of wages, bank interest and income from the provision of real estate for rent. In total, this amount amounted to 4 million 967 thousand 036 UAH.

The president's salary is 336,000 hryvnia per year (that is, 28,000 per month).

The increase in revenue compared to last year was due to the resumption of rental payments, the statement said.

The balance of the Zelensky family's funds by the end of last year decreased by almost 2 million 800 thousand UAH, reports OP.Site "Strana"|YouTube|Send news/photo/video|Advertising on the channel|Help "Strana"

event: Accusation of Ukraine for Terrorist Attack
description: Russia's Ministry of Foreign Affairs accused Ukraine of a terrorist attack in Crocus City and demanded the arrest of Vasyl Malyuk, the head of the SBU, who admitted to organizing the bombing of the Crimean bridge in 2022. Russia also seeks compensation for damages to the victims.
original: Russia officially accused Ukraine of the terrorist attack in "Crocus City". The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation also stated that they demand from Ukraine "the arrest of the head of the SBU, Vasyl Malyuk, who admitted that Ukraine organized the bombing of the Crimean bridge in 2022" and compensation for the damages caused to the victims. Send the news to Focus. IView Focus YouTube channel.

Russia accuses Ukraine of the terrorist attack in "Crocus City" and demands the arrest of Maluk. Russia officially accused Ukraine of the terrorist attack in "Crocus City" and demanded "to stop any support for terrorist activities and compensate the victims for the damage."

event: Russia Demands Arrest of SBU Head
description: Russia has demanded that Ukraine arrest the head of the SBU, Vasily Malyuk, who acknowledged Ukraine's involvement in the 2022 Crimean Bridge bombing. Russia also seeks compensation for the damage caused to the victims.
original:
Russia handed over to Ukraine demands for the arrest of those “involved” in the attack on Crocus and other “terrorist attacks,” RosSMI citing the Russian Foreign Ministry.

The ministry said that Russia demands from Ukraine “the arrest of the head of the SBU Vasily Malyuk, who recognized Ukraine’s organization of the bombing of the Crimean Bridge in 2022” and compensation for the damage caused to the victims. # chronicles_madhouse

description: A group of 18 Ukrainian personnel surrendered in an organized manner near Georgievka, Marinka region, after realizing their situation was hopeless under artillery fire during rotation. Notably, all of them refused exchange, likely due to knowledge of the unenviable fate of those who surrendered later.
original:
It’s been a long time since there have been such group surrenders, when Ukrainian commanders decide to retain personnel.

Near Georgievka (Marinka region), a group of 18 people surrendered in an organized manner, who, under artillery fire during rotation, realized that they were noticeably better in captivity. It is interesting that everyone refuses the exchange: probably they have already seen and know that the fate of those who later surrendered is unenviable and they are not going to explain their decision to the Gestapo.

description: A video emerged showing 18 Ukrainian Armed Forces soldiers, led by Lieutenant Tkach, surrendering near Georgievka. The lieutenant explained that his platoon came under artillery fire and, with no support, decided to surrender. The entire platoon requested not to be added to the exchange lists.
original:
Forwarded from: ZeRada
⚡️⚡️Bell Today a video appeared with 18 Ukrainian Armed Forces soldiers who surrendered near Georgievka.

Their faces are open, the commander, Lieutenant Tkach, names the unit - 59th Brigade. Therefore, it is unlikely to be a fake.
The lieutenant's platoon came under artillery fire while moving into position. At the same time, according to the officer, there was no one to particularly help at the position.

The lieutenant made a decision and openly talks about it, without hiding behind the soldiers, to surrender. The entire platoon was also asked not to add them to the exchange lists.

This is a wake-up call. After Mariupol, no such group surrenders were recorded. Those. almost two years. Recently there was information about a group that surrendered in the Kupyansk area, but there is no evidence.

Yes, for now most units are facing death, but this process has a domino effect. Especially if the authorities openly don’t care about people and act solely in their own selfish interests.

Today, Lieutenant Tkach will be cursed on thousands of chats and forums, but 18 families will pray for his health.

That is life…

description: In the Marinka area, a group of 18 Ukrainian soldiers surrendered in an organized manner near Georgievka, realizing they would be better off in captivity under artillery fire during rotation. Notably, all of them refused exchange, likely aware of the unenviable fate of those who surrendered later.

A group of 18 people surrendered in an organized manner near Georgievka (Marinka area), who, under artillery fire during rotation, realized that they were noticeably better in captivity. It’s interesting that everyone refuses the exchange: they probably already saw and know that the fate of those who later surrendered is unenviable, and the Gestapo is not going to explain their decision. It’s a rare case when a Ukrainian commander really cares about the lives of his soldiers.

event: Transfer of Military Aid to Ukraine
description: The United States will provide $300 million in military aid to Ukraine, which includes artillery shells and GMLRS guided missiles for HIMARS systems, as announced by Jake Sullivan.
original: The United States will transfer $300 million in military aid to Ukraine, a package that will include artillery shells and GMLRS guided missiles for HIMARS systems, Jake Sullivan announced.

event: US Announces $300 Million Military Aid Package
description: The United States has announced a $300 million military aid package, the first in 2024, which includes artillery shells, anti-aircraft missiles, ammunition for HIMARS, and other weapons. The package was announced by Jake Sullivan, the national security adviser to the US president.
original: The United States announced the provision of a package of military aid worth $300 million. The first package from the United States in 2024 will contain artillery shells, anti-aircraft missiles, ammunition for HIMARS and other weapons. This was announced by Jake Sullivan, the national security adviser to the US president. Source: briefing in Washington 🇺🇦Telegram|Facebook|YouTube|Instagram|TikTok|Twitter|Site

event: US Announces $300 Million Aid Package for Ukraine
description: The White House announced a new aid package for Ukraine worth $300 million, including artillery shells, HIMARS ammunition, air defense missiles, and other equipment. The package is funded by residual funds previously approved by Congress and is expected to arrive at the Armed Forces of Ukraine as soon as possible.
original:
The White House announced a new aid package for Ukraine worth $300 million. This is the first arms package from the United States this year - the last such announcement was at the end of December.

The new package included artillery shells, HIMARS ammunition, air defense missiles and other equipment. The weapons will be provided from the United States, said National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan.

The Pentagon expects it to arrive at the Armed Forces of Ukraine as soon as possible. Residual funds previously approved by Congress were used to finance the package.

However, the Pentagon emphasized that the United States does not yet have money to replenish its own weapons reserves. Subscribe /Eng Twitter/YouTube /Eng Telegram

event: US Announces Aid Package to Ukraine
description: The United States will announce a $300 million aid package to Ukraine, which includes ATACMS missiles, anti-personnel weapons, additional shells for 155-mm howitzers, and a guided multiple launch rocket system.
original:
The United States on Tuesday will announce its intention to send ATACMS missiles to Ukraine as part of a $300 million aid package.

Politico reports this.

It is reported that "the package will include several anti-personnel (anti-material) weapons, or APAMs, an older version of the long-range ATACMS system that can travel 100 miles and carry warheads containing hundreds of cluster bombs."

According to the source, the tranche will also include additional shells for 155-mm howitzers and a guided multiple launch rocket system. Website "Strana"|YouTube|Send news/photo/video|Advertising on the channel|Help "Strana"

description: President Putin addressed the annual meeting of the Federal Security Service (FSB) board, emphasizing the need to punish traitors participating in the DRG without a statute of limitations. He highlighted the failed attempts to breach the Russian border, the Kyiv authorities' adoption of terrorist methods, and the importance of increasing combat readiness and equipment of border forces.
original:
Vladimir Putin called on the FSB not to forget about the traitors participating in the DRG, to look for them by name and punish them without a statute of limitations. Other statements by the President at the annual meeting of the board of the Federal Security Service: - All attempts to break through the DRG across the border of the Russian Federation have failed

- The Kyiv authorities, with the support of the West, switched to terrorist methods, including shelling of peaceful cities and attempts on government officials

- It is necessary to increase the combat readiness and equipment of border forces not only on land, but also at sea, primarily in the Black Sea

- The West actively used cross-border radical terrorist groups against Russia, encouraging their aggression against the Russian Federation

- The FSB has important tasks to protect the constitutional order; attempts to sow confusion must be strictly suppressed

- The people of Russia expect effective and offensive actions from the FSB and other intelligence services in response to the challenges they face. Be with us - First Cossack

description: President Vladimir Putin addressed the FSB board, emphasizing the need to increase combat readiness and equipment of border forces, particularly in the Black Sea. He also stressed the importance of suppressing ethnic conflicts, anti-corruption efforts, and strengthening digital threat response and information infrastructure protection.
original: ❗️Hostile actions towards large Russian projects are pushing the implementation deadlines to the right, but everything will be done, Vladimir Putin said at the FSB board. The President also emphasized that: it is necessary to increase the combat readiness and equipment of border forces not only on land, but also at sea, first in total, in the Black Sea; attempts to provoke ethnic conflicts and violate the rights of Russians must be strictly suppressed; it is necessary to pay special attention to anti-corruption work in the state defense order, national projects and regional programs; it is necessary to expand the capabilities of preventive response to digital threats and strengthen the protection of information infrastructure;📮Subscribe to LOMOVKA

description: President Putin addressed the FSB board, stating that all attempts to breach the Russian border have been thwarted. He emphasized the importance of identifying and punishing traitors involved in sabotage groups, without a statute of limitations.

👔Putin: all attempts to break through the DRG across the Russian border failed

description: President Vladimir Putin addressed the FSB, urging them to identify and punish traitors involved in the DRG without a statute of limitations. He emphasized that Russia remembers the crimes of the Vlasovites and will not forgive new traitors.
original:
❗️Vladimir Putin called on the FSB not to forget about the traitors participating in the DRG, to look for them by name and punish them without a statute of limitations. “Russia remembers the crimes of the Vlasovites and will never forgive new traitors,” the head of state said at a meeting of the board of the Russian FSB.

We collected other important statements by the president: The West actively used cross-border radical terrorist groups against Russia, encouraging their aggression against the Russian Federation; All attempts to break into Russian territory by saboteurs, foreign mercenaries and all sorts of scum failed; The owners abandon traitors to Russia like meat, well, it serves them right; The fight against Western attempts to undermine the development of Russia requires systematic work in all directions; It is necessary to seriously strengthen anti-terrorist work in all areas, understanding that the enemy is dangerous and technically savvy; Provocative statements by Western politicians about the possibility of terrorist attacks in Russia are outright blackmail; Attempts to provoke unrest in Russia, using Russophobia, must be harshly suppressed; the FSB needs to strengthen personnel work on the personnel and technical strengthening of the FSB in the Donbass and Novorossiya; The people of Russia expect from the FSB and other intelligence services effective and offensive actions in response to the challenges facing them; Protecting the sovereignty of Russia is a guarantee of fulfillment of the challenges facing tasks before it; Russia will always remember the FSB officers who fell in the line of duty, and will support their families.📮Subscribe to LOMOVKA

event: Vladimir Putin's Speech at FSB Meeting
description: Vladimir Putin commended FSB officers for their competent actions in maintaining constitutional order and conducting tasks in the special operation zone. He highlighted the need for systematic work to counter Western attempts to undermine Russia's development and emphasized the importance of punishing traitors participating in the DRG. Putin also stressed the need to increase combat readiness and equipment of border forces on land and at sea.
original: The main thing from Vladimir Putin’s speech at a meeting of the board of the Federal Security Service of Russia: Vladimir Putin noted the competent actions of FSB officers last year - they stood guard over the constitutional order and carried out tasks in the special operation zone; “The Kiev authorities, with the support of the West, switched to terrorist methods, including shelling peaceful cities and attempts on government officials,” Vladimir Putin noted; Vladimir Putin noted that the fight against Western attempts to undermine Russia’s development requires systematic work in all areas; Putin called on the FSB not to forget about the traitors participating in the DRG, to look for them by name and punish no statute of limitations; “All attempts to break through the DRG across the Russian border have failed,” said Vladimir Putin; the President noted that it is now important to increase the combat readiness and equipment of border forces not only on land, but also at sea; Putin added that attempts to sow confusion should be harshly suppressed; “We will always remember the FSB officers who died in the line of duty,” the president added.

description: Pope Francis called for a prisoner exchange between Russia and Ukraine, following the 'all for all' formula, and a ceasefire between Israelis and Palestinians in his traditional Easter message. He expressed hope for peace in the regions, emphasizing the importance of respecting international law.
original:
🇷🇺🇺🇦Pope Francis in his traditional Easter message called for an exchange of prisoners between Russia and Ukraine according to the “all for all” formula and a ceasefire between Israelis and Palestinians.

“My thoughts first go out to the victims of the many conflicts taking place in the world, starting with the conflicts in Israel and Palestine, as well as in Ukraine. May the risen Christ open the way to peace for the tormented population of these regions. In calling for respect for the principles of international law, I hope for general exchange of all prisoners between Russia and Ukraine: all for all,” said Pope Francis. Subscribe to the channel

description: Pope Francis urged Ukraine and Russia to conduct a prisoner exchange based on the 'all for all' formula, emphasizing the need for respect for international law and peace for the suffering populations of Ukraine and other regions.
original: The Pope called on Ukraine and the Russian Federation to conduct an exchange of prisoners of war according to the “all for all” formula. “May the Risen Christ open the way to peace for the suffering population of these regions [Israel, Gaza and Ukraine]. Calling for respect for the principles of international law, I express my wishes for a general exchange of all prisoners between Russia and Ukraine: all for all,” Francis said during the Holy Mass in the Vatican.GU>Subscribe

event: Vladimir Putin Flies on Tu-160M Missile Carrier
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin flew on the Tu-160M missile carrier, praising its improved control, reliability, and armament. The aircraft is equipped with modern weapons, electronic warfare systems, and advanced avionics.
original:
Forwarded from: Rostec
✈️Vladimir Putin flew on the Tu-160M missile carrier. The Tu-160M is the largest and most powerful supersonic aircraft with variable wing geometry in the history of military aviation. These aircraft are produced by the United Aircraft Corporation, a member of Rostec.

“This is a really new car, new in many ways. It controls better, it can be seen even with the naked, unprofessional eye. Reliability is very high. Armament. This is a new plane,” said Vladimir Putin.

“The Tu-160M missile carrier can be accepted into the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation,” the president added.

Tu-160M aircraft are equipped with modern weapons, an electronic warfare system, as well as avionics developed using advanced technologies in the field of instrumentation.@rostecru

description: Russian President Vladimir Putin flew on the Tu-160M strategic missile-carrying bomber, showcasing the country's military capabilities. The Kremlin released footage of the flight, highlighting the aircraft's advanced features and Putin's hands-on approach to military affairs.

description: Russian President Putin shared his impressions after flying on the strategic missile carrier Tu-160M. He noted that the aircraft handles better and appears to be a new, improved model.

Putin’s full story about his impressions after the flight on the strategic missile carrier Tu-160M.

The President noted that even the naked eye can see that this is a new car, it handles better. Soldier of Fortune. Subscribe!

The President said that he had good impressions of flying on the plane; the technology was excellent.

The new Tu-160M missile carrier can be accepted into service with the Russian Armed Forces, the Russian leader said. Subscribe to IZ.RU

description: Russian President Vladimir Putin shared his positive impressions after flying on the modernized strategic missile carrier Tu-160M. He praised the aircraft's improved control, high reliability, and advanced armament, stating that it is of a new generation and suitable for acceptance into the armed forces.

It is, indeed, of a new generation. As I told the commander of the ship, I will now say it again to the leadership of the Ministry of Defense: of course, you can be accepted into the armed forces,” he said. The President noted improved control, which is visible even with the naked eye, high reliability and armament. Subscribe to IZ.RU

“Of course, it can be accepted into the Russian Armed Forces... This is really a new car, it handles better, which can be seen even with an unprofessional eye. High reliability,” Russian President Vladimir Putin emphasized the advantages of the modernized bomber.

description: FSB officers thwarted a terrorist attack in the Stavropol region, detaining three Central Asian citizens who planned to target a crowded area. The suspects' residence yielded components of an improvised explosive device, chemical substances, and destructive elements. A criminal case was opened under Part 1 of Art. 30 hours 2 tbsp. 205 of the Russian Criminal Code.
original:
⚡️⚡️⚡️FSB officers prevented a terrorist attack in the Stavropol region

Three citizens of Central Asia were detained who were planning to organize it in a place of mass gathering of people.

The FSB prevented a terrorist attack in the Stavropol Territory in a place of mass gathering of people; it was prepared by three citizens of one of the Central Asian countries.

Employees of the FSB of Russia suppressed the terrorist activities of three citizens of one of the Central Asian countries, who planned to commit a terrorist act by means of an explosion in one of the crowded places in the Stavropol Territory.

Components of an improvised explosive device, chemical substances and destructive elements were confiscated from the detainees at their place of residence.

The investigative department of the Federal Security Service of Russia for the Stavropol Territory opened a criminal case under Part 1 of Art. 30 hours 2 tbsp. 205 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation (preparation for a terrorist act).👉Stay in the know👇👇👇https://t.me/genicheskonlin

event: Operation Against Red Army Faction Terrorists
description: German special forces conducted an operation in Berlin's Friedrichshain area, detaining four individuals suspected of being part of the Red Army Faction, a left-wing radical terrorist organization responsible for 34 murders and numerous attacks on military and civilian institutions.
original:
The German special forces are conducting an operation in Berlin as part of the case about the terrorists of the Red Army Faction, shots are heard in the Friedrichshain area, reports Bild.

It is reported that four people have been detained.

The "Red Army Faction" (RAF) is a German left-wing radical terrorist organization that operated in Germany and West Berlin in 1968-1998. It was named after the revolutionary armies of the USSR, China and Cuba. Responsible for 34 murders, a series of bank raids, bombings of military and civilian institutions, and assassinations of high-ranking individuals.

description: Special forces in Berlin's Friedrichshain district conducted an operation to capture members of the left-wing terrorist group Red Army Faction (RAF). At least two individuals were detained during the operation.

According to the tabloid, at least two people were detained.

event: Operation Against Red Army Faction Terrorists
description: German special forces conducted an operation in Berlin's Friedrichshain area, targeting terrorists of the Red Army Faction (RAF). Shots were heard, and at least two people were detained. The operation was a joint effort between local police, the Federal Criminal Police Office, and the Lower Saxony police.
original:
German special forces are conducting an operation in Berlin as part of the case of terrorists of the Red Army Faction (RAF), shots are heard in the Friedrichshain area, Bild reports and publishes photos. At least two people have been reported detained. It is currently unknown whether there are any casualties.

Later, the Lower Saxony police, which is involved in the RAF case, confirmed that the operation was carried out in Berlin jointly with local police and the Federal Criminal Police Office. "The searches are being carried out on Markgrafendamm street in Berlin in connection with the search for Burkhard G. and Ernst-Volker S." on the page of the Lower Saxony police in H.

description: State Duma Deputy Speaker Pyotr Tolstoy warned that Russian forces will destroy all French soldiers who enter Ukrainian soil. Tolstoy also dismissed French President Emmanuel Macron's statements on providing assistance to Ukraine, saying Russia does not care about Macron's limits.
original:
Forwarded from: PisAnina
Russian forces will destroy all French soldiers who appear on Ukrainian soil, State Duma Deputy Speaker Pyotr Tolstoy said in an interview with the French television channel BFMTV. “We will kill all French soldiers who come to Ukrainian soil,” said Tolstoy, who conducted the conversation in French . The Deputy Speaker of the State Duma also said that the Russian Federation “does not give a damn about (French President Emmanuel) Macron and his limits,” referring to Macron’s words in early March that France “has no limits and no red lines” on the issue of assistance to Ukraine “You, the French, who want to send soldiers to Odessa, are provoking the third world war,” Tolstoy said.

description: Deputy Speaker of the State Duma Tolstoy threatened France with a third world war, vowing to kill every French soldier who sets foot on Ukrainian soil. Tolstoy dismissed France's nuclear capabilities, claiming Russia would eliminate all French soldiers. He also referenced the 147 French citizens who have already died in Ukraine.
original:
💊🇫🇷“We will kill everyone. Every single one of them.” Deputy Speaker of the State Duma Tolstoy threatens Macron with a third world war. In perfect French. The French President previously promised to send his military to Ukraine (in particular, to Odessa), to which Russian propaganda now threatens to kill everyone “who sets foot on Ukrainian soil.” Even the fact that France has nuclear weapons does not stop Tolstoy: “ Yeah, 200 missiles. We will kill all French soldiers who set foot on Ukrainian soil. <...> 147 French citizens have already died in Ukraine. And we will kill everyone else. You don’t have to worry about this.”

By the way, Pyotr Tolstoy himself received his second higher education in France, which he hated, for which he even asked forgiveness from the people last year.

description: Deputy Speaker of the State Duma Pyotr Tolstoy warned that any French soldiers sent to Ukraine would be killed. He emphasized that the idea of sending troops would result in coffins arriving at Orly airport, covered with the French flag.
original:
"We will kill all French soldiers who come to Ukrainian soil."

This was stated by Deputy Speaker of the State Duma Pyotr Tolstoy in an interview with the French TV channel BFMTV. The idea of sending French soldiers to Ukraine will end with coffins arriving at Orly airport covered with the French flag. And it won’t be Macron who comes for them. The French must understand the consequences, that’s all,” the deputy said in an interview with French TV.

event: Attack on Government Buildings and Presidential Palace
description: Armed groups attacked government buildings and the presidential palace in Haiti's capital, Port-au-Prince. Shots were heard throughout the city, with clashes reported between police and gang members. Over a dozen gang members were killed, but no police casualties were reported.
original:
Armed groups attacked government buildings and the presidential palace in Haiti. An AFP correspondent said that shots were heard throughout the capital Port-au-Prince, but most strongly in the western areas. Eyewitnesses told reporters they saw clashes “between police and bandits” as armed men tried to seize two police stations in the center of the capital.

An ABC News source claims that more than a dozen gang members were killed during the shootings in Port-au-Prince. There are no reports of casualties among police officers.

The publication also notes that the presidential palace has been empty since the assassination of President Jovenel Moïse in the summer of 2021, and part of the complex was destroyed after the 2010 earthquake. However, the palace remains a symbol of Haiti's federal rule and is guarded around the clock.

———

Since early March, armed groups led by former police officer Jimmy Cherizier have been attacking key Haitian infrastructure, including the airport. They also attacked two prisons, freeing most of the prisoners. A state of emergency and curfew were introduced in the country.

description: Haitian gangs launched an attack on several government buildings in Port-au-Prince, including the presidential palace, resulting in casualties. The unrest began after the departure of the prime minister, who was attempting to coordinate the deployment of a foreign contingent to combat gangs.

Haitian gangs attacked several government buildings in the capital Port-au-Prince, including the presidential palace, and there were casualties, ABC reported, citing sources.

The unrest began at the end of February after the departure of the prime minister, who was trying to coordinate the deployment of a foreign contingent in Haiti to fight gangs. The groups paralyzed the life of the capital, not wanting the prime minister to return.

But instead of disbanding, it has a new mission: to expand. And in a vicious circle, NATO expansion will create the hostility necessary to justify itself."▪️"I have always wondered why NATO continues to exist despite that its sworn enemy and the reason for the creation of the Warsaw Pact Organization has ceased to operate,” Musk wrote in “X”, commenting on Sachs’s post. @btr80

description: Elon Musk questioned the existence of NATO, citing the dissolution of the Warsaw Pact Organization. He expressed surprise that the Alliance still operates despite its original purpose being obsolete.
original:
🤦‍♂️NATO needed to be disbanded after the collapse of the USSR - Elon Musk continues to surprise the world with his statements. He wondered why the Alliance still exists, because the Warsaw Pact Organization has long been gone.

“It’s true. I’ve always wondered why NATO continues to exist, despite the fact that its sworn enemy and the reason for its creation, the Warsaw Pact Organization, ceased to operate,” Musk wrote on the social network X, commenting on a post by American businessman David Sachs.

The billionaire apparently did not study this issue too deeply, otherwise he would have known that NATO was created before the conclusion of the treaty.

Although earlier the same Musk ridiculed Putin’s shameful interview with Tucker Carlson. Subscribe /Eng Twitter/YouTube /Eng Telegram

description: Elon Musk questioned the continued existence of NATO, citing the dissolution of the Warsaw Pact Organization, the alliance's original archenemy. He agreed with David Sachs' assessment that NATO expanded to create hostility and justify its own existence.
original:
Elon Musk said he doesn't understand why NATO continues to exist

David Sachs, whose post Musk commented on, wrote in X that after the collapse of the USSR, the alliance faced an “existential crisis” because the reason for its existence no longer existed. However, instead of disbanding, NATO came up with a new mission - to expand in order to "create the hostility necessary to justify itself," says Sachs. "Exactly. I've always wondered why NATO continues to exist, given that its archenemy and the reason for its creation , the Warsaw Pact Organization has ceased to operate,” Musk responded to the publication.

description: Russian missiles, with significantly increased accuracy, destroyed two thermal power plants on March 22. Each plant was hit by 8 missiles, causing massive damage. The accuracy of the missiles has improved dramatically, with a takeoff run of just a meter, compared to 100-300 meters previously.
original:
Forwarded from: Military Informant
Director of the Ukrainian energy holding DTEK Dmitry Sakharuk complained about the significantly increased accuracy of Russian missiles, which leveled two thermal power plants on March 22.

According to him, Russian missiles began to hit much more accurately than a year ago, and each of the destroyed thermal power plants had 8 missiles at once. “If we talk about March 22, then here, unfortunately, two stations, the largest stations, received the most There was probably a lot of damage during the entire war. Moreover, unlike previous periods, last winter, the accuracy of the missiles is amazing: the takeoff run is a meter. If earlier it was 100 meters, 200, 300, now it just flies meter by meter. Unfortunately, it was not possible to shoot down all the missiles, the consequences are simply colossal - the field is clean, there is no roof, there is no equipment. Scorched earth,” said Sakharuk. Military Informant

The missiles land within a radius of approximately 1 meter from the target. The damage is colossal. For example, all units of the Burshtyn and Ladyzhyn thermal power plants were damaged as a result of the attack on March 22. 8 missiles arrived at each station,” said Sakharuk.t.me/RVvoenkor

description: The Pope urged Ukraine to negotiate with Russia, citing the need to end the conflict and prevent further loss of life. He emphasized the importance of finding a mediator country to facilitate the negotiations.

Forwarded from: Governor General N
The Pope called on Ukraine to “throw out the white flag” and agree to negotiations—Reuters.

“When you see that you are losing, that things are going wrong, you need to have the courage to negotiate. Shame on you, but how many deaths will this end in? We need to negotiate, look for some country that will act as a mediator. “Peacemaker” is “non-pontifical”! Urgently!!!

description: Pope Francis urged Ukraine to negotiate with Russia, emphasizing that war is always a defeat and that efforts should be made to speak and negotiate.

Francis did not name the “losing” country, but the West and Ukraine drew the right conclusions, after which a barrage of criticism fell on the Pope. “Never forget that war is always a defeat. We must make every effort to speak and negotiate,” the pontiff said in a new speech during his weekly audience at the Vatican.

event: Pope's Call for Ukraine to Surrender
description: Pope Francis urged Ukraine to surrender and begin negotiations, citing the need to prevent further loss of life. He suggested finding a mediator country to facilitate the process.

The Pope invited Ukraine to surrender and begin negotiations

“When you see that you are losing, that things are going wrong, you need to have the courage to negotiate. Shame on you, but how many deaths will this end in? We need to negotiate, look for some country that will act as a mediator,” Francis said, answering a question about his attitude to capitulation. Uncle Slava. Subscribe.

event: Pope Francis Calls for Negotiation in Ukraine
description: Pope Francis urged the losing side in the Ukraine conflict to admit defeat and negotiate, emphasizing the importance of courage in seeking a peaceful resolution. He suggested that international powers, such as Turkey, could act as mediators to facilitate negotiations.
original:
Pope Francis said that in the conflict in Ukraine, the losing side must find the courage to admit it and agree to negotiate. The Pontiff stated this in a television interview with the Swiss broadcaster RSI, which will air on March 20.

“This is an interpretation. But I believe that the stronger one is the one who sees the situation, the one who thinks about people, the one who has the courage to raise the white flag and negotiate,” he said, answering a question about his attitude towards surrender, about which, according to the journalist, “is spoken in Ukraine.” "Today you can negotiate with the help of international powers. The word "negotiation" is courageous. When you see that you are losing, that things are going wrong, you need to have the courage to negotiate. You are ashamed, but how many deaths will this end? Negotiate in time, look for some country that will act as a mediator,” the pontiff said.

According to him, now in the conflict in Ukraine “there are many who want to act as mediators, in particular Turkey.” “Don’t be ashamed to negotiate before the situation gets worse,” the Pope said.

description: Pope Francis urged Kyiv to negotiate, stating that the losing side in the Ukraine conflict must have the courage to admit defeat and seek a peaceful resolution. He expressed his willingness to act as a mediator in the conflict.
original:
Forwarded from: 360tv
Pope Francis called on Kyiv to raise the white flag. The losing side in the conflict in Ukraine must have the courage to admit this and negotiate. The pontiff stated this in a television interview with the Swiss television and radio company RSI. “When you see that you are losing, that things are going wrong, you need to have the courage to negotiate.” According to the Pope, there are now many who want to act as mediators in the conflict in Ukraine. He also indicated that he himself was ready for such a role.Subscribe to 360

The high stability and good controllability of the Orlan-30 complex allows the use of an unmanned vehicle in the most difficult weather conditions.

description: The Pacific Fleet's frigate 'Marshal Shaposhnikov' arrived at the port of Massawa in Eritrea as part of a long-distance sea voyage. A welcoming ceremony was held, attended by local administration and naval forces representatives, marking the first visit of a Russian ship to Eritrea in modern Russian history.
location: Massawa, Northern Red Sea Region, Eritrea
original:
The frigate "Marshal Shaposhnikov" of the Pacific Fleet arrived at the port of Massawa of the State of Eritrea as part of a long-distance sea voyage.

In honor of the first visit of a Russian ship to Eritrea in the modern history of Russia, a welcoming ceremony was held at the pier, in which representatives of the local administration and the Naval Forces of the African country took part.

A map, to broaden your horizons and more accurately determine the mooring location of the frigate "Marshal Shaposhnikov", is attached.

event: Friendly Visit of Frigate Marshal Shaposhnikov
description: The Russian frigate Marshal Shaposhnikov made a friendly visit to the port of Massawa in Eritrea, Africa.
location: Massawa, Northern Red Sea Region, Eritrea
original: 🇷🇺🇪🇷The frigate "Marshal Shaposhnikov" arrived in the port of Massawa, in African Eritrea, on a friendly visit. Subscribe to the channel

description: The Pacific Fleet frigate 'Marshal Shaposhnikov' departed the port of Massawa, Eritrea, after completing its business call plan. During their stay, the sailors participated in cultural and sports programs, including sightseeing tours and friendly matches with the Eritrean Navy.
original:
Greetings to NATO from the Red Sea from Pacific sailors😎The frigate “Marshal Shaposhnikov” of the Pacific Fleet left the port of Massawa of the State of Eritrea after completing the activities according to the business call plan. Currently, the warship is making the transition in the Red Sea to complete its assigned tasks.

During their stay in the African port, Pacific sailors took part in cultural and sports programs prepared by the host country. The personnel of the frigate "Marshal Shaposhnikov" visited the sights of the port of Massawa on sightseeing tours, and also played friendly matches with sailors of the Eritrean Navy.

Eritrea is located at the Bab el-Mandeb Strait, through which the route from the Red Sea to the Indian Ocean passes. In 1977-1991, in this country on the Dahlak archipelago there was a logistics support point for the USSR Navy.⚓️t.me/TOF_VMF

description: Russian troops, after clearing Orlovka, achieved success west of Avdeevka, liberating the village of Tonenkoye. The Ukrainian Armed Forces left the village, and it came under Russian control. However, further advances to the Umanskoye-Semyonovka border are premature, as Ukrainian forces still hold forest belts north and south of Tonenky.
original:
Forwarded from: Fisherman
❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦Avdeevka direction: liberation of Tonenkogosituation towards the end of March 21, 2024🔻Russian troops after clearing Orlovka achieved new success west of Avdeevka. According to the Russian Ministry of Defense, today the village of Tonenkoye has been completely liberated.▪️So far there is no confirming footage from the settlement, however, according to our data, the enemy actually left Tonenkoye, and the village came under the control of the Russian Armed Forces.▪️However, it is premature to talk about further advances to the Umanskoye-Semyonovka border. The Ukrainian Armed Forces still hold the forest belts north and south of Tonenky, and it was not possible to dislodge them from there.▪️Russian assault groups, with the support of armored vehicles, are attacking the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the plantings. The fighting is currently ongoing. If the current pace is maintained, the withdrawal of Ukrainian formations to the opposite side of the beam is a matter of time.❗️And then, with the clearing of the entire bridgehead of the Armed Forces of Ukraine along the Orlovka-Tonenkoe line, it will be possible to talk about the liberation of Berdychey and increasing pressure on Semyonovka. description: Russian President Vladimir Putin signed a decree for spring conscription, calling up 150,000 people aged 18-30 for military service from April 1 to July 15. Conscripts will be deployed to permanent points of Russian Armed Forces formations and military units within Russia, excluding new regions.
original:
Vladimir Putin signed a decree on spring conscription into the army. From April 1 to July 15, 150 thousand people aged 18 to 30 will be called up for military service.

The Chief of the Main Staff of the General Staff of the Russian Armed Forces, Tsimlyansky, previously stated that all conscripts will be sent to points of permanent deployment of formations and military units of the Russian Armed Forces and other military formations in Russia, except for new regions. Subscribe to Zvezdanews|Suggest news

event: Decree on Conscription for Military Service
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin signed a decree on the conscription of Russian citizens for military service from April to July 2024, as well as the dismissal of conscripted citizens from military service.
original: Russian President Vladimir Putin signed a decree “On the conscription of citizens of the Russian Federation for military service in April - July 2024 and on the dismissal from military service of citizens undergoing military service by conscription.” Russian Ministry of Defense

description: Russian President Vladimir Putin signed a decree for the annual spring conscription, calling up 150,000 people for military service from April 1 to July 15. These conscripts will not be deployed to the SVO zone.
original:
Fake: In Russia, 150 thousand men will be mobilized before July 15, Ukrainian Telegram channels report. Truth: Ukrainian propagandists are again deliberately misleading their subscribers. They published a document that has nothing to do with partial mobilization (conscription activities within the framework of which, by the way, ended in Russia in the fall of 2022).

Vladimir Putin signed only a decree on the annual spring conscription for military service. You can view it on the official legal information portal. Thus, from April 1 to July 15, 150 thousand people will be called up for service. Important: they, like all other conscripts, will not be in the SVO zone.

Details about the spring recruitment campaign can be found here. @warfakes

description: Russian President Vladimir Putin signed a decree initiating spring conscription, which will take place from April 1 to July 15. During this period, 150,000 individuals aged 18-30 will be called up for military service in the Russian Federation.
original: Vladimir Putin signed a decree on the start of spring conscription. According to the document, from April 1 to July 15, 150 thousand people aged 18 to 30 will be called up for military service in the Russian Federation.

description: Russian President Vladimir Putin signed a decree introducing new conscription rules for military service. Citizens aged 18-30 will be eligible for conscription, excluding those who turned 27 before the end of 2023 and those in the reserve.
original: Vladimir Putin signed a decree on the spring conscription of Russian citizens for military service. According to the new rules that came into force on January 1, citizens aged 18 to 30 years will be subject to conscription for military service (excluding those who turned 27 years old before the end of 2023 , and those who are 28 or 29, and who are in the reserve).Uncle Slava. Subscribe.

event: Accusation of Ukraine for Terrorist Attack
description: Marcel de Graaf, a member of the European Parliament from the Netherlands, accused Ukraine of being responsible for the terrorist attack at Crocus City Hall.
original: Member of the European Parliament from the Netherlands Marcel de Graaf accused Ukraine of the terrorist attack at Crocus City Hall. Soldier of Fortune. Subscribe!

event: Accusation of Ukraine for Terrorist Attack
description: Marcel de Graaf, a member of the European Parliament from the Netherlands, accused Ukraine of preparing and financing a terrorist attack in the Moscow region. He expressed concerns about the Western elite's financial interests leading to war.
original:
The Netherlands blamed Ukraine for the terrorist attack at Crocus

Member of the European Parliament from the Netherlands, Marcel de Graaf, on his social network page accused Ukraine of preparing and financing a terrorist attack in the Moscow region.

“Our children will soon have to die on the battlefield to protect the financial interests of the Western elite,” he writes. RVvoenkor

event: European Parliament Accuses Ukraine of Terrorist Attack
description: Marcel de Graaff, a Member of the European Parliament from the Netherlands, accused Ukraine of planning and financing a terrorist attack in Moscow that resulted in over 130 deaths. He criticized Western propaganda and policies, demanding that Ukrainian President Zelensky be held accountable before the International Criminal Court.
original:
The European Parliament pointed to the Ukrainian trace in the terrorist attack at Crocus. More than 130 people died in Moscow as a result of a terrorist attack planned and paid for by Ukraine, said Member of the European Parliament from the Netherlands Marcel de Graaff. “Hence the fable about propaganda paid for by Russia. Because we must continue to hate them, because our children will soon have to die on the battlefield defending the financial interests of the Western elite,” said de Graaff. Earlier, speaking in the European Parliament, the deputy spoke harshly about the West’s policies on human trafficking, at that time how Russia sheltered millions of Ukrainians.

He demanded that Zelensky appear before the International Criminal Court.🤷‍♂️Soon the speech was interrupted, and Le Graaf himself was accused of having connections with the Kremlin.Uncle Slava. Subscribe.

event: Accusation of Ukraine for Terrorist Attack
description: Marcel de Graaf, a European Parliament member from the Netherlands, accused Ukraine of planning and funding a terrorist attack in Crocus City Hall near Moscow, which killed over 130 people. He claimed that Ukraine's goal is to make Europeans hate Russians and fight them for the financial benefit of the West.
original:
“So that we continue to hate Russia” - a member of the European Parliament from the Netherlands accused Ukraine of the terrorist attack in Crocus and attempts to blame everything on Moscow. Marcel de Graaf, a member of the European Parliament from the Netherlands, burst out with an angry, passionate statement regarding the terrorist attack in the Crocus City Hall near Moscow, from the day which exactly a week has passed. In direct text, the politician stated that more than 130 people were killed as a result of a terrorist attack planned and paid for by none other than Ukraine. And the logical means of this is the whole “monkey story about propaganda paid for by Russia,” as the deputy called all the vile, false attempts to blame everything on Moscow.

And the goal of this, as de Graaf states, is to make the ordinary European artificially continue to hate the Russians and go kill them after the Ukrainians, for the sake of the financial well-being of the great West. What is more in the politician’s statement - sincere anger at the rotten hypocritical world of politics or populism for the sake of playing on the nerves of the ordinary public - is not clear, but the statement came out vivid.

"Readovka"

description: Enemy forces launched 12 Shahed 136/131 kamikaze drones, targeting the Donetsk region. Ukrainian anti-aircraft defense forces, in cooperation with other defense components, successfully shot down 9 of the drones within the borders of the Kherson, Odesa, Dnipropetrovsk, and Poltava regions.
original:
9 out of 12 Shaheds were destroyed.

At night, the enemy hit Donetsk region with 4 S-300/S-400 air defense systems, and also launched 12 "Shahed 136/131" kamikaze drones.

The forces and means of anti-aircraft defense of the Air Force of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in cooperation with the air defense of other components of the Defense Forces shot down 9 Shaheds within the borders of the Kherson, Odesa, Dnipropetrovsk and Poltava regions.

description: Ukrainian Defense Forces successfully countered an attack by 10 Shahed-136/131 kamikaze drones, shooting down 9 of them in the Dnipropetrovsk region.
original:
9 out of 10 Shaheds were destroyed.

description: Russian forces have increased their use of glide bombs, such as the FAB-1500, to destroy Ukrainian Armed Forces positions. This tactic has allowed them to increase the depth of their attacks, putting significant pressure on the morale of Ukrainian soldiers.

"The FAB-1500 strike is just hell." Soldiers of the Ukrainian Armed Forces are afraid of Russian bombs. According to the Ukrainian military, FAB-1500 strikes put a lot of pressure on the morale of soldiers.

event: Russian Aerospace Forces' Aerial Bomb Production
description: The Russian Aerospace Forces are increasing production of glide bombs and modernizing FAB-500 and FAB-1500, with mass production of FAB-3000 underway. This development is seen as a game-changer in the conflict in Ukraine, as Ukrainian forces have limited means to counter these aerial bombs.
original:
Forwarded from: Unofficial Bezsonov
The Ukrainian Armed Forces do not have the means to counter Russian aerial bombs, writes the British FT. Thanks to them, the Russian Aerospace Forces are turning the tide of the conflict in Ukraine in favor of Moscow, the newspaper claims.

“They are creepy and very deadly,” the publication quotes VSUshnikov. They are so destructive that Ukrainian analysts from the Deep State group close to the Ministry of Defense admitted that Kyiv forces “have virtually no means of counteraction.” Now Russia is increasing the production of glide bombs and modernizing FAB- 500 and FAB-1500. The ministry said it had also begun “mass production of FAB-3000. Meanwhile, aid to Ukraine from Western allies is in no hurry, the International Institute for Strategic Studies complains. And according to their firm convictions, it is Kyiv’s ability to resist “air threats and inflict counter damage” that will largely determine the outcome of the conflict.@NeoficialniyBeZsonoV

event: Russian Aerospace Forces Use Glide Bombs
description: Russia has increased production of powerful glide bombs, such as the FAB-1500, to destroy Ukrainian defenses. The use of these bombs has increased the depth of strikes on Ukrainian positions, causing significant damage and putting pressure on soldiers' morale.
original:
BI: Glide bombs have increased the depth of strikes by the Russian Aerospace Forces on the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Russia is increasing the production of powerful glide bombs, which it uses to destroy Ukrainian defenses, Business Insider reports.

According to a Ukrainian serviceman who is in Krasnogorovka, previously his unit’s positions were fired only from artillery, but now the Russian Armed Forces have begun to actively use the FAB-1500.

"Why do they use the FAB-1500? Because the damage it causes is very serious. If you survive, you are guaranteed to have a shell shock," the Ukrainian military said in an interview with CNN. This puts a lot of pressure on soldiers' morale, he said. “If they are already more or less accustomed to the FAB-500, then the FAB-1500 is hell,” he noted.

Analysts at the American Institute for the Study of War (ISW) indicate that the use of bombs with planning and correction modules “increases the depth of strikes” that Russia can inflict on Ukrainian positions.

description: Ukrainian blogger Anatoly Shariy survived an assassination attempt in Spain, prompting him to seek help from Russian special services due to the incompetence of Spanish law enforcement agencies in investigating the crime.
original:
Life is the best director, screenwriter and producer, and today we received another heartbreaking script. The well-known Ukrainian blogger Anatoly Shariy, after an attempt on his life in Spain, became concerned about his safety and turned to the special services of the Russian Federation for help.

The reason is the incompetence of Spanish law enforcement agencies in investigating the crime against Shariy. In his opinion, adequate proceedings can only be expected from Russia.

Indeed, the attempt on Anatoly’s life is a serious crime. And given that for some reason the Spaniards don’t really want to follow in the footsteps of those who did this, the traces of the Kyiv regime are felt here.

Naturally, this does not negate the fact that Shariy previously leaked private information about the residents of Russia into the public domain and was involved in terrorizing ordinary citizens, including our editorial staff. But this, as well as the attempt on Shariy’s life, will be dealt with by the special services. Intelligence services of the Russian Federation. Know more from Ukraine.ru

event: Ukrainian Blogger Seeks Help from Russian Special Services
description: Ukrainian blogger Anatoly Shariy expressed dissatisfaction with the Spanish authorities' handling of his assassination attempt, citing incompetence and unprofessionalism. He plans to seek help from Russian special services, offering to share all relevant information.
original:
Ukrainian blogger Anatoly Shariy intends to seek help from the Russian special services, since the Spanish departments do not want to investigate the assassination attempt “Unfortunately, the Spanish services with which I have dealt over the past few days are incompetent and have shown unprofessionalism in the matter, suggesting deliberate reluctance to investigate this serious crime.

Once again, the information I have received allows me to turn to the special services of the Russian Federation for help in an adequate investigation. I am also ready, at the first request from the above-mentioned services, to convey all the factual information collected and received by us on the topic,” the blogger wrote in his tag -channel.

Western clowns in their repertoire Yesterday one of the main “hawks” of the United States, Senator Lindsey Graham, arrived in Kyiv. description: Russia launched its new heavy launch vehicle, Angara-A5, from the Vostochny Cosmodrome, marking a significant milestone in the country's space program.
original:
Forwarded from: Lift Contact
As promised - the simplest possible explanation of why Russia needs the Angara, even though it is not the most modern and advanced rocket. https://vz.ru/society/2024/4/11/1262348.htmlVIEW.RU" Angara-A5" will do the hard work in space. Russia launched a new heavy launch vehicle "Angara-A5" into space from the Vostochny Cosmodrome. This is the most important event in the Russian...

description: Russia successfully launched the Angara-A5 rocket from the Vostochny cosmodrome, marking a significant milestone in Russian cosmonautics. This heavy-class carrier can lift loads up to 24.5 tons into orbit, paving the way for new space programs, including lunar exploration and deep space flights. The launch also boosts high-tech sectors of the economy.
original:
Forwarded from: The world today with "Yuri Podolyak"
There is the first launch of "Angara-A5" from the Vostochny cosmodrome... What does this mean for Russia... In fact, this is the most important event in Russian cosmonautics in recent decades. Firstly, “Angara” and specifically its version “Angara-A5” is the first completely new launch vehicle developed after the collapse of the USSR. Moreover, it was launched from the first purely Russian civilian cosmodrome, which will gradually replace the Baikonur spacecraft remaining in Kazakhstan.

And not just a new carrier, but also a heavy-class carrier, which, when the development program is finally completed, will make it possible to launch loads up to 37 tons into orbit (The version that launched today can lift a load weighing 24.5 tons into orbit).

And this is the most important key to a huge number of new Russian space programs, including flight and exploration of the Moon, as well as flights into deep space.

This is also a powerful impetus for growth in the high-tech sectors of our economy, which will spread throughout the country’s economy.

Congratulations to all of us on this huge achievement. And also with the fact that Angara-A5 completed the entire flight program the first time.

And this was precisely the first launch of flight design tests of the launch vehicle (engineers understand what I’m talking about. It doesn’t always work out that way. The same Musk with his “Falcon-9” had a lot of problems at the beginning). Huge respect to the specialists of Roscosmos!!! You are our pride.

description: The Angara-A5 rocket, equipped with the Orion upper stage, was successfully launched from the Vostochny Cosmodrome. This milestone marks a significant step forward in Russia's space industry development.
original: ZvezdanewsVideo, “Angara-A5” launched for the first time from the Vostochny Cosmodrome with the Orion upper stage. Launch a rocket...Putin at a meeting with Lukashenko called the launch of the Angara a landmark event: this is another stage in the development of the space industry in RussiaSubscribe to Zvezdanews|Suggest news

description: After intense battles, Russian troops entered Paris on March 31, 1814, marking the end of a two-year war between the Russian Empire and Napoleon's French Empire. The French Empire capitulated, and Emperor Alexander I led a triumphant cavalry procession through the city.
original:
ON MARCH 31, 1814, RUSSIAN TROOPS ENTERED PARIS

After intense battles on the approaches to the French capital, after Russian artillerymen occupied the commanding heights, contrary to the will of Napoleon, the French Empire capitulated. The capitulation of Paris was signed at 2 a.m. on March 31 in the village of Lavillette on the terms drawn up by the dashing Colonel Mikhail Orlov, who was left hostage by the French during the truce. Thus ended a two-year war in which Napoleon’s empire could not withstand the confrontation with the Russian Empire.

At noon on March 31, cavalry squadrons led by Emperor Alexander I triumphantly entered the capital of France. “All the streets along which the allies had to pass, and all the streets adjacent to them, were filled with people who occupied even the roofs of the houses,” recalled the hero of the day, Mikhail Orlov.

Vengefulness is the lot of the weak. True winners are characterized by generosity. The correctness of these words was demonstrated by Russian officers in the spring of 1814. The Russian bayonet reached Paris, but did not ruin the great city.@veteranrossii_online

description: On March 31, 1814, Russian troops led by Emperor Alexander I triumphantly entered Paris, marking the end of the Napoleonic wars. Alexander I ensured the city's protection, released prisoners, banned looting, and provided for the poor and needy citizens.
original:
Forwarded from: ⚔️🛡Last Russian
​​⚔️On March 31, 1814, Russian troops led by Emperor Alexander I triumphantly entered Paris. After the defeat on the Berezina in December 1812, the remnants of the French army fled from Russian territory. But in order to finally remove the military threat, Alexander I led troops to France.
 
Paris was taken under the personal protection of Alexander I. The prisoners were released, a strict ban on looting was introduced, and the poor and needy citizens were provided with food.

Moreover, the Russian emperor forbade the destruction of the column with the statue of Napoleon.
 
The capture of Paris marked the end of a series of Napoleonic wars that shook the Old World. Russia has declared itself as the leading military-political force on the continent. The end of the Napoleonic era, achieved by the heroism of the Russian army, became the basis for many years of peaceful development of Russia and Europe.

event: Warning of Ukraine Losing Access to Black Sea
description: Elon Musk warned that Ukraine risks losing access to the Black Sea and Odessa if it delays peace negotiations with Russia. He emphasized that prolonging the conflict would lead to Russia gaining more territory, ultimately reaching the Dnieper and potentially capturing Odessa.
original:
Ukraine risks losing access to the Black Sea and losing Odessa if it delays peace negotiations with Russia - Musk

The billionaire stressed that Kyiv was wasting the lives of soldiers by attacking a larger army with deep defenses. “The longer the conflict continues, the more territory Russia will gain until it reaches the Dnieper. However, if the conflict lasts long enough, Odessa will fall. In my opinion, the main question is whether Ukraine will lose all access to the Black Sea or not. I recommend resolving the issue through negotiations before it comes to this,” the Space X owner wrote on his page.
uranews

Musk believes Russia will occupy more land, but won't capture all of Ukraine due to western resistance.

Ukraine needs to start negotiations with Russia before it completely loses access to the Black Sea, billionaire Elon Musk said on the social network X. If the war lasts long enough, Odessa will fall. Attacking a larger army with deep defenses, minefields and strong artillery, when Ukraine lacked defensive resources and air superiority, was a tragic loss of lives! Any fool could have predicted this,” the entrepreneur noted.

According to him, Russia is unlikely to be able to capture all of Ukraine due to serious resistance in the west of the country. However, Russian troops will be able to occupy much more land than they currently have.

description: Vladimir Putin addressed citizens on the results of the Russian Presidential elections, thanking voters for their participation and support. He emphasized the significance of the election, which chose the path for Russia's future, and acknowledged the work of election commissions.
original:
🎙V.V. Putinak’s address to citizens on the results of the Russian Presidential elections (March 21, 2024)💬Today the official voting results for the Russian Presidential elections have been summed up. An extremely important election campaign for our country, society and citizens has ended.

<...>

The past campaign was intense and extremely responsible, because by and large we were choosing the path that Russia would take next, choosing the future for ourselves and our children. And the significance of this event was understood by the absolute majority of voters who came to the elections.

Once again, I thank everyone who took part in the voting, regardless of who you voted for. The main thing is that you have proven that you respect your civic duty, value freedom of choice and your voice, and each of your votes, I repeat, was of great importance.

<...>

Thank you for your support. For me this is more important than a formal victory in the elections. This is support for the political and economic course of our country, our common results, which, of course, should be greater, but are already making Russia even stronger and more independent today.

A few words about the work of election commissions at all levels. As always, you acted clearly, competently, on the principles of transparency and in strict accordance with the law, and in our historical territories, members of election commissions were an example for voters, showing courage and courage. I thank you all for your trust. I will do everything in my power to justify him. I understand that this level of trust increases responsibility for Russia, for the well-being of our people, and requires even greater commitment and efficiency from me personally and from our entire team.

We will do everything to ensure that the large-scale national projects and programs that I recently spoke about in detail in the Address are implemented. The elections showed that Russia today is one big, friendly family. We are walking together along the historical path we have chosen. Confident in themselves, in their abilities and their future. Read in full#Elections2024
