description: An unknown person took at least 4 people hostage at a local bar in Ede, Netherlands, claiming to have explosives. The city center was cordoned off, and 150 houses were evacuated. Three hostages were later released, but the situation remains ongoing.
original:
He says he has explosives: an unknown person took four people hostage in the Netherlands. An unknown person is holding at least 4 people hostage in the Dutch city of Ede. Local media reported this.

A man who took several people hostage at a local bar claims to have explosives.

The city center has been cordoned off, residents of 150 houses have been evacuated.UPD: Three hostages held in a cafe in the Dutch city of Ede have been released, but the incident is not over, the police saySubscribe /Eng Twitter/YouTube /Eng Telegram

description: OJ Simpson, an American athlete accused of double murder, has died at the age of 76 due to cancer. Despite being acquitted of the crime, Simpson was later ordered to pay $33.5 million to the victims' relatives in a civil lawsuit.
original:
OJ Simpson, an American athlete accused of double murder, has died. The jury acquitted him. Jay Simpson was 76 years old. The cause of his death was cancer, The Guardian reports.

In early February 2024, Local 10 News reported that Simpson had prostate cancer and was undergoing chemotherapy. In recent months, media reported, he lived in a hospice. Then OJ Simpson denied this, although back in 2023 he said that he had “caught” some form of cancer.

———

OJ Simpson is an American football star. He played in the National Football League since the early 1970s and was one of the most successful athletes at his position as a running back. Simpson holds many NFL records.

In the mid-1990s, Simpson was accused of killing his ex-wife Nicole Brown Simpson and her friend Ron Goldman. A jury found him not guilty, but he was later ordered to pay $33.5 million to relatives of the victims who filed a civil lawsuit against him. The Simpson trial became one of the most famous and discussed trials in US history.

OJ Simpson was later arrested several times for minor crimes. Simpson was sentenced to prison in 2008 for armed robbery and kidnapping. In 2017, he was released from prison on parole.

Read more about the athlete and actor in the Meduza article, which was published in 2017.

description: American athlete OJ Simpson, acquitted of double murder in the 1990s, has died at the age of 76 due to cancer. Simpson was a star in the National Football League and gained notoriety after being accused of murdering his ex-wife and her friend in 1994.
original:
American athlete OJ Simpson has died. In the 1990s, he was accused of double murder, but the jury acquitted him. Simpson died at the age of 76 due to cancer, The Guardian reports.

Since the early 1970s, the athlete played in the National Football League and was one of the main stars of American football.

The athlete gained notoriety after he was accused of murdering his ex-wife Nicole Brown and her friend Ron Goldman in 1994. Simpson was acquitted by a jury. Later, the court ordered him to pay $33.5 million to the relatives of the victims who filed a civil lawsuit against him.

The case, also known as People v. Simpson, became one of the most famous trials in US history. Photo: Reuters Subscribe to Rain's Telegram Watch us on YouTube

description: OJ Simpson, a renowned athlete and actor, passed away at the age of 76. He was known for his sports achievements, film roles, and high-profile criminal cases, including the murder trial of his ex-wife and her lover, as well as his imprisonment for armed robbery and kidnapping.
original:
Athlete and actor Oriental James Simpson has died at the age of 76. He died on Wednesday, April 10. His family announced his death.

In addition to his numerous sports achievements and film roles, OJ Simpson is known for his high-profile criminal case in the mid-1990s. He was accused of killing his ex-wife Nicole Brown-Simpson and her lover Ronald Goldman. In October 1995, a criminal court found Simpson not guilty of murder. However, in early 1997, a civil court found him guilty of unlawful death, for which Simpson was fined $33.5 million.

In 2008, a Las Vegas court sentenced him to 33 years in prison for armed robbery and kidnapping. He was pardoned in June 2017 and was released from prison in October of that year.

In February of this year, it became known that Simpson was diagnosed with prostate cancer. The life and career of the sports star, who became famous, among other things, for his problems with the law, is in the Kommersant certificate. Photo: Charles LeBlanc/Flickr@kommersant

description: OJ Simpson, the former American football player acquitted of murdering his ex-wife Nicole Brown Simpson and her friend Ron Goldman in 1994, has died at the age of 76 due to cancer.
original:
Former American football player who gained notoriety after the death of his ex-wife, OJ Simpson, has died at the age of 76, ABC News reports.

The family said in a statement that Simpson died of cancer.

He gained notoriety in 1994, when Simpson's ex-wife Nicole Brown Simpson and her friend Ron Goldman were stabbed to death in the Simpsons' former home in Los Angeles.

In October 1995, after a trial that lasted 11 months, the jury acquitted Simpson, which became a sensation. Prosecutors said the jury was guided by emotion rather than reason because the evidence against OJ Simpson was overwhelming. Photo: Zuma\TASS@interfaxonline

description: OJ Simpson, the former football player and actor, died at the age of 76 in Las Vegas after battling prostate cancer. Simpson was acquitted of murdering his ex-wife and her lover, but was later imprisoned for robbery.
original:
The person involved in one of the most scandalous cases in US history, football player and actor OJ Simpson, died at the age of 76 in Las Vegas. His family announced this on the social network X.

In February 2024, it became known that Simpson had prostate cancer. The media wrote that in recent months he had been living in a hospice. Last year, the football player himself said that he “caught” a certain form of cancer, but insisted that he was able to cope with the disease. Simpson escaped punishment for the murder of his ex-wife and her lover, although all of America was sure of his guilt. The court acquitted the actor, but he paid large compensation to the relatives of those killed in a civil suit. Later, Simpson ended up behind bars anyway - for robbery in 2007, he was released in the fall of 2017. The video shows the famous chase of Simpson after a double murder in 1994, it was broadcast on all American television channels. The police could not catch the athlete for a long time; he threatened suicide on live television. Simpson was detained only a few hours later. Subscribe to Zvezdanews|Suggest news

event: Transfer of Military Aid to Ukraine
description: Belgium has pledged to provide Ukraine with a new package of military aid, including 300 protected Iveco LMV vehicles, three minesweepers, and artillery shells.
original: It became known that in addition to 300 protected Iveco LMV vehicles, Belgium will transfer three minesweepers and artillery shells to Ukraine in a new package

description: Belgium is providing a €412 million military aid package to Ukraine, consisting of 300 Lynx LMV armored vehicles, artillery ammunition, and 3 Alkmaar class minesweepers. Ukrainian personnel will receive training from Belgian and Dutch military forces.
original: 🇧🇪Belgium is preparing a package of military assistance worth €412 million for Ukraine. The package, in particular, will include 300 Lynx LMV armored vehicles, artillery ammunition, as well as 3 Alkmaar class minesweepers. Ukrainian crews will be trained by the Belgian and Dutch military.

event: Belgium Approves Additional Military Aid to Ukraine
description: Belgium has approved an additional 412 million euros in military assistance to Ukraine, including the transfer of three Tripartite minesweepers, up to 300 Iveco LMV Lynx light armored vehicles, armored ambulances, reconnaissance UAVs, and artillery ammunition worth 373.1 million euros.
original: Belgian Defense Minister Ludivine Dedonder reported that the Belgian government has approved the allocation of an additional 412 million euros for military assistance to Ukraine. It is planned to transfer three Tripartite minesweepers to Ukraine (photo) in partnership with the Netherlands. Belgium will organize basic training for Ukrainian personnel at the Naval Academy, and the Netherlands will provide on-the-job training for crews. The Belgian Ministry of Defense will also provide maintenance for these ships. It is also planned to transfer up to 300 Iveco LMV Lynx light armored vehicles to Ukraine and jointly with other Benelux countries purchase armored ambulances and reconnaissance UAVs for Ukraine. The largest part of the aid package is the supply of artillery ammunition to Ukraine worth 373.1 million euros. The ammunition will be supplied from the Belgian Ministry of Defense's own stockpiles, as well as through international group procurement from various companies.

event: Japan Prepares for War over Taiwan
description: Japan has initiated a program to construct bunkers on remote islands in Okinawa Prefecture, near Taiwan, due to concerns about a potential war over Taiwan. These shelters are designed to provide protection from landing groups, saboteurs, ballistic missiles, and air strikes, allowing people to survive for several weeks in the event of war.
original:
Japan has begun preparing for a war for Taiwan. Japan has approved a program to build bunkers on the remote islands of Okinawa Prefecture, which are located in close proximity to Taiwan, the publication reports

The reason for this was the authorities’ fears about the outbreak of a war for the island of Taiwan.

These bomb shelters will allow people to survive for a couple of weeks in the event of war. The shelters will be able to provide protection both from the advance of landing groups and saboteurs, and from ballistic missiles and air strikes - The Asahi Shimbun frightens the Japanese.

This is the conclusion made by Bild military expert Julian Repke, commenting on the attack on the Trypilska Thermal Power Plant in the Kyiv region.

The fun begins. Because our missiles haven’t even started yet.

description: According to Bild military expert Julian Repke, Ukraine has depleted its stock of Patriot and Iris-T missiles, as well as most other air defense systems. This is despite having hundreds of systems and thousands of missiles in warehouses.
original:
Ukraine has run out of missiles for Patriot, Iris-T and most other air defense systems.

This is the conclusion made by Bild military expert Julian Repke, commenting on the attack on the Trypilska Thermal Power Plant in the Kyiv region.

“As I said a few weeks ago (and almost no one believed me): Ukraine has run out of Patriot and Iris-T missiles. Most other air defense stocks have also been depleted or destroyed. And this despite the fact that we have hundreds of systems and thousands of missiles in our warehouses. There are no words. Just anger,” writes Repke.

Let us remind you that Kyiv and the region are covered by the “Patriots” better than other regions of Ukraine. This is probably why Repke concluded that they had run out of missiles: the Trypillya Thermal Power Plant is located only 30 kilometers from Kyiv and is clearly covered by the Patriot umbrella.

Or rather, it was covered.

description: Local officials in the Kursk region killed a 7-month-old puppy to avoid it interfering with Governor Roman Starovoit's inspection of the village of Zhernovets. The puppy was calm and loved by the villagers. Governor Starovoit condemned the act, calling it senseless human cruelty, and promised to punish the perpetrators according to the law.
original:
Officials from the Kursk region killed a puppy so that it would not interfere with Governor Roman Starovoit’s inspection of the village of Zhernovets. The head of the village council and a man with a gun arrived in a municipal car to the place where the puppy lived. They cornered the dog and shot him. It is known that the animal was about 7 months old, he was completely calm and the whole village loved the baby.

Governor Starovoit had to give a comment, he declared the local authorities to be guilty: “For me, this situation is outrageous. I am ashamed of the senseless human cruelty. I love dogs very much. Therefore, for me the situation with the killed puppy is especially acute. I will not just leave it like that. The perpetrators will be punished in accordance with the law."Investigators went to Zhernovets. The State Duma called for a criminal case to be opened after the murder of a puppy in a village near Kursk. Deputy Burmatov promised to get involved in the situation and send requests to the Ministry of Internal Affairs and the prosecutor's office. Petya the First. Subscribe

description: Before Governor Roman Starovoit's visit to the village of Zhernovets near Kursk, a seven-month-old puppy living at a construction site was shot dead by a local resident. The puppy was reportedly not aggressive, and its body was taken away in the trunk of a Volga.
original:
In the village of Zhernovets near Kursk, before the governor’s visit, a puppy living at a construction site was shot dead

A village resident told animal rights activists that on the morning of March 27, a few hours before the arrival of Governor Roman Starovoit, “a village council car arrived there, the puppy was driven into a corner (personally by the head of the s/s) and one of the local residents shot the puppy with a hunting rifle.”

Employees of the Kursk dog shelter “Right to Live” accompanied the story with photographs of a gray Volga and its two passengers, as well as a dead dog. The Kursk group Animal Protection Hotline published a recording of a conversation with an eyewitness. The man says that the seven-month-old puppy was not aggressive, and the men took his body away in the trunk of a Volga.

The head of the Tazovsky village council, Natalya Gorchakova, told Kurskie Izvestia that she “did not order anyone to kill the dog.” The official called the publication of the story about the killed dog “revenge” by the renovation contractor.

Starovoit spoke about the beginning of a police check.

description: Local officials in the Kursk region killed a 7-month-old puppy to avoid it interfering with Governor Roman Starovoit's inspection of the village of Zhernovets. The puppy was calm and loved by the villagers. Governor Starovoit condemned the act, calling it senseless human cruelty, and promised to punish the perpetrators.
original:
Officials from the Kursk region killed a puppy so that it would not interfere with Governor Roman Starovoit’s inspection of the village of Zhernovets. The head of the village council and a man with a gun arrived in a municipal car to the place where the puppy lived. They cornered the dog and shot him. It is known that the animal was about 7 months old, he was completely calm and the whole village loved the baby.

Governor Starovoit had to give a comment, he declared the local authorities to be guilty: “For me, this situation is outrageous. I am ashamed of the senseless human cruelty. I love dogs very much. Therefore, for me the situation with the killed puppy is especially acute. I will not just leave it like that. The perpetrators will be punished in accordance with the law."Investigators went to Zhernovets. The State Duma called for a criminal case to be opened after the murder of a puppy in a village near Kursk. Deputy Burmatov promised to get involved in the situation and send requests to the Ministry of Internal Affairs and the prosecutor's office.

description: Thousands of people gathered at the Borisov cemetery in Moscow to pay their respects to Alexei Navalny. They brought a massive amount of flowers, covering the wooden cross at his grave. Despite cemetery security's attempts to limit the time spent at the grave, many remained, chanting 'Navalny' and throwing flowers over the fence.
original:
Thousands of people came to the Borisov cemetery to honor the memory of Alexei Navalny. At the politician’s grave, a mountain of flowers as tall as a man On March 3, so many flowers were brought to the grave of Alexei Navalny at the Borisov Cemetery in Moscow that they completely covered the wooden cross installed at the burial (its height is usually about 1.7 meters).

People brought flowers to Navalny's grave all day. The line stretched for several hundred meters, although the cemetery security demanded that those who came spend only as much time at the politician’s grave as was necessary to lay flowers.

At 17:00 Moscow time the entrance to the cemetery was closed, but not everyone who came to honor Navalny’s memory left. Meduza readers reported that dozens of people remained at the entrance. They demanded to be allowed inside, chanted “Navalny” and threw flowers over the fence.

———

Photos and videos: Meduza readers.

description: Despite government efforts to suppress the event, thousands of Russians attended Alexei Navalny's funeral in Moscow, paying their respects and leaving flowers at his grave. Similar spontaneous memorials have appeared in other cities, only to be cleared by security forces.
original:
Forwarded from: ASTRA
To the question “were you afraid to go out?” everyone answers approximately the same—yes, they were afraid, but they couldn’t help but come. “I’m not afraid, and don’t be afraid,” Navalny bequeathed. These words of his are repeated to me more than once by people at funerals. The curators of Russian propaganda have ordered that Navalny’s funeral be spoken either badly or not at all. That is why pro-government publications yesterday were filled with the same type of notes with a count of employees of foreign diplomatic missions who came to the funeral.

It didn’t work: for the second day in Moscow, people have been crowding in line at the grave of Alexei Navalny. Throwing flowers over the fence. And in other cities, in partisan fashion, they bring bouquets to spontaneous memorials, which are cleared by security forces day after day.

Yesterday, an ASTRA correspondent spent more than six hours at the funeral of Alexei Navalny. In the crowd of grief-stricken Russians, she found not only grief, but also the ghost of that very “Beautiful Russia of the future” that Navalny loved to talk about during his lifetime: telegra.ph/Vojna-v-Ukraine-i-ego-smert--ehto-kak -nachalo-chetvertoj-stadii-raka--reportazh-ASTRA-s-pohoron-Navalnogo-03-02Telegraph “The war in Ukraine and his death are like the beginning of the fourth stage of cancer,” report...Last Friday they said goodbye in Moscow with Alexei Navalny. While the EU and the US are preparing to expand the sanctions lists, and the politician’s associates are looking for his killers...

description: On the second day after Navalny's funeral, a large number of people gathered at the Borisov cemetery to pay their respects. The atmosphere remained calm, with no incidents reported. A police van was present, but officers were not visible. The grave was almost hidden behind the numerous flowers brought by mourners.
original: 🌹On the second day after Navalny’s funeral, a line of people wishing to say goodbye to him again lined up at the Borisov cemetery - people continued to bring flowers “Everything is calm and without incidents. There is one paddy wagon nearby, but the police are not visible,” say those who came. The grave behind the flowers is almost invisible. Photos and videos: Medusa, Mediazona, Astra, Alexander Plyushchev.

event: Death of GRU Special Forces Officer
description: Colonel Timur Myasnikov, a GRU special forces officer, was killed in Crocus City. He was on vacation with his family when a terrorist attack occurred. With his experience in combat zones, he quickly assessed the situation and pushed his wife and son to safety, buying them time. He faced the terrorist, possibly trying to neutralize him, and ultimately gave his life to protect his loved ones.
original:
On the death of a GRU special forces officer in Crocus City

Two bullets in the stomach, one in the face... These are very telling wounds. He did not run, did not hide between the rows, curled up in a fetal position, and did not instinctively cover his head with his hands. He met death eye to eye...

Colonel Timur Myasnikov, a native of the 3rd GRU special forces brigade, came from the Northern Military District on vacation. I went to the concert with my wife and son. They left their daughter at home. He understood immediately what was happening. Experience. He fought in Tajikistan, Kosovo, Chechnya, Syria, Ukraine...

Seconds to make a decision. Pushes Polina and Ruslan into a safe space: “Run!” He himself turns to face the terrorist. What was there in those last seconds?

Maybe Timur simply covered his loved ones with himself, maybe he stepped towards the bastard to try to neutralize him. He bought time for his wife and son, remaining to the end a real Russian special forces officer who does not bend the knee to the enemy.

“Man. Even a MAN. Didn't mince words. Always stood up for his own people. Easy to communicate and behave.
A very competent officer, leader and commander,” an acquaintance succinctly described the deceased colonel to me in a military way.

Always stood up for his own... Eternal glory to the hero! @sashakots

event: Terrorist Attack in Crocus City Hall
description: GRU special forces colonel Timur Myasnikov from Samara was killed in a terrorist attack in Crocus City Hall. He had arrived on vacation from the Northern Military District zone a few days prior. Myasnikov was a decorated veteran, having fought in Kosovo, Tajikistan, and Ukraine. He sacrificed himself to save his family, pushing them to safety before being hit by three bullets.

30.03.24. Relevant.
“As a result of the terrorist attack in Crocus City Hall, GRU special forces colonel from Samara Timur Myasnikov was killed. He came on vacation from the Northern Military District zone a few days before the tragedy.
Show more
Timur Myasnikov took part in hostilities in Kosovo, Tajikistan, and for the last two years he fought in the territory of the former Ukraine. He served in the 3rd Special Forces Brigade, General Staff of the Russian Armed Forces.
The head of the Samara branch of the “Officers of Russia” organization, Arthur Malivanchuk, says:
“Just a few days ago, he came on vacation to his family in Moscow. And, it had to happen, he decided to go to Crocus for a concert with his wife Polina and son Ruslan. The bandits appeared unexpectedly. Timur managed to push his wife and son to a safe place, and "He himself came under heavy fire. He was hit by three bullets. For several days the doctors fought for his life, but, unfortunately, they could not save him."
Timur Myasnikov graduated from the Suvorov Military School, a military university, and served in the 3rd Special Forces Brigade, the General Staff of the Russian Armed Forces. Awarded military orders and medals. Everlasting memory!".

event: Withdrawal of SAMP/T Mamba Air Defense System
description: Italy plans to withdraw its SAMP/T Mamba air defense system from Slovakia, leaving the country vulnerable to potential threats. This move follows the departure of American Patriot air defense systems, which were previously stationed in the country.
original:
Italy intends to withdraw the SAMP/T Mamba air defense system from Slovakia, Fico said.

The former Slovak liberal government gave Ukraine a functional Russian S-300 air defense system. Then American Patriot air defense systems appeared in the country “for a moment,” but they also left, and now the Italian ones will leave.” “And I ask, Lord, who will guard our nuclear power plants and other strategic targets?” Fico said.

☢️The Ukrainian Armed Forces today attacked the training center of the Zaporozhye NPP 10 minutes after the visit of IAEA representatives “The Ukrainian Armed Forces attack occurred 10 minutes after IAEA employees drove past the training center, who were returning from a planned event to visit an external radiation monitoring laboratory,” stated ZNPP Communications Director Evgenia Yashina.

In connection with the attacks of the Kyiv regime on a nuclear facility, an extraordinary meeting of the IAEA on the Zaporizhzhya Nuclear Power Plant will be convened. It will take place on April 11, said the Russian permanent representative in Vienna.

I believe that Ukrainian losses should be counted in millions, and not in hundreds of thousands. There are no reserves in this country, no one to fight with. event: General Raimund Andrzejczak's Statement on Ukraine's Military Losses
description: General Raimund Andrzejczak, former chief of the Polish army's general staff, stated that Ukraine's military losses are in the millions, not hundreds of thousands. He believes Ukraine lacks resources, people, and competent command to fight against Russia, and the situation is 'very, very dramatic' for Kyiv.
original:
TelegramPool N3“We need to prepare. General Raimund Andrzejczak on the threat of war”: Poland said that Ukraine has already lost millions of soldiers.

“Losses of the Ukrainian ...VIEW MESSAGE🇵🇱🇺🇦The former chief of the general staff of the Polish army, General Raimund Andrzejczak, stated that the losses of the Ukrainian Armed Forces at the front are calculated in “millions, not hundreds of thousands.”

He pointed out that Ukraine is losing in the confrontation with the Russian Federation and a “very, very dramatic” situation is developing for Kyiv. Andrzejczak believes that Ukraine has neither the resources nor the people to fight, and the change of command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in no way affected the situation: the problems remain the same, the general concluded.🔻Note that this is not the first time the Polish general has spoken about that the Ukrainian army lacks not only equipment and weapons, but also competent command. And at the same time, it is absolutely obvious that even former Polish army officials openly discredit the Kiev regime, pointing out that in Kyiv not only do they not know how to govern the country on their own - it is all corruption - but they also cannot develop resistance tactics. And therefore we need to help, push, so to speak, in the right direction.🔻In addition, Andrzejczak has always supported the active participation of Poland in the conflict in Ukraine and, given that now the Poles are being driven to “save a drowning man,” it is quite clear what the general is leading to by voicing similar statements.🔻It is also worth considering that no one will let the Poles “jump” from the topic of Ukraine: in addition to Western partners, there are also their own (not very satisfied) taxpayers. It will be difficult to explain to them why the government has pumped several annual budgets into equipment and weapons, which will ultimately be lost without service in warehouses.

Moreover, the Poles do not have the infrastructure to service the zoo using German, Korean, American, British and God knows what other equipment. And it is virtually impossible to create it.

And here the matter is simple - like with ice cream: either you eat it, or it melts.#Poland#Ukraine#army@rybartogether with @pl_syrenkaSupport us

event: Polish General Raimund Andrzejczak's Assessment of Ukraine's Situation
description: Polish General Raimund Andrzejczak stated that Ukraine's losses are not hundreds of thousands, but 10 million people, including those who fled the country. He believes that Ukraine lacks resources and manpower to continue fighting, and that the situation on the Ukrainian-Russian front is dramatic.
original:
‘Ukraine’s losses are not hundreds of thousands of people, but 10 million’ – Polish General Raimund Andrzejczak
 
-Your colleagues often say that Russia will lose at any moment.
 
-Well, here reality showed itself completely differently.
 
-What is the situation on the Ukrainian-Russian front today?
 
-Dramatically. Very dramatic. There are no miracles in war. The change of commander-in-chief could not change the strategic situation. General Syrsky has the same dilemmas as General Zaluzhny. It turned out that he had to withdraw his troops and put the front line in order. All the problems that Zaluzhny had remain. Lack of troop recruitment, problems with mobilization, supply of equipment. This is how they win a war.
 
-Does the fate of Ukraine really depend on this additional aid package from the United States?
 
-There are many factors, not just this package, that cannot be approved in the United States. This is also a question for Ukrainians: how much longer will they endure. They are losing over 10 million people. According to my estimates, losses should be in the millions [taking into account those who fled the country], and not hundreds of thousands. There are no resources in this country, no one to fight with. https://vk.com/video-66833222_456300666VkVideo by Gorlovka Self-Defensevk video

description: In Teplodar, Odessa region, local residents took matters into their own hands by neutralizing the air raid siren on their house roof, using polyurethane foam to silence it. They claimed the siren's frequent warnings were disrupting their sleep.
original:
“I understand everything, but I have to work tomorrow!” — in Teplodar, Odessa region, local residents neutralized the air raid siren on the roof of their house in order to sleep peacefully. Odessa residents of the town of Teplodar demonstrated their love of life on the verge of surrealism. On the roof of one of the houses there was a siren that sounded when the air raid started. She screamed often, designed to warn and thus save people's lives. But citizens who like to sleep more than run around basements had a different opinion, armed with polyurethane foam.

Having climbed to the roof, the ungrateful optimists flooded the device and, satisfied, went to bed. When they were caught later, they explained their action this way: the screaming was disturbing their sleep. As much as possible, take action! Moreover, there is no need to be afraid of Russian missiles - it is Ukrainian air defense that kills. You don’t know whether to laugh or cry, but this is Odessa region!

event: Transfer of F-16 Fighter to Ukraine
description: Denmark plans to transfer the first F-16 fighter to Ukraine this summer, pending the completion of Ukrainian pilot training, support personnel, and necessary logistics and infrastructure.
original:
Denmark intends to transfer the first F-16 fighter to Kyiv this summer - the country's Defense Minister Troels Lund Poulsen “It is difficult to set a fixed schedule for the transfer of F-16 fighters, because there are several conditions that must be met in order for Ukraine to use the donated aircraft.

But I have informed the conciliation circle that we are now working towards greater unity this summer, when we expect to deliver the first F-16 fighters to Ukraine if preparations go as planned,” the statement said.

The final delivery of the first Danish F-16 combat aircraft depends, among other things, on the full training of Ukrainian pilots and the necessary Ukrainian support personnel, as well as the availability of the necessary logistics and infrastructure in Ukraine.

It is clarified that the remaining fighters will have to go to Ukraine later this year.

The US Department of Defense has officially announced that the first F-16 fighters from Denmark will be transferred to Ukraine in the summer of 2024, confirming earlier information that the training of Ukrainian pilots on the F-16 will end in time for the summer.

The Danish Ministry of Defense also released a similar statement, citing a joint statement by the “aviation coalition” led by Denmark, the Netherlands and the United States. Military Informant

event: First Flight of Il-114-300 Turboprop Aircraft
description: The second experimental Il-114-300 turboprop aircraft successfully completed its first 40-minute flight, marking a significant milestone in the flight test program for the Russian regional aircraft. The flight tested the aircraft's stability, controllability, and Russian systems and equipment.
original:
The second experimental turboprop aircraft Il-114-300 made its first flight. The second experimental turboprop aircraft Il-114-300 made its first flight, resuming the flight test program of the Russian regional aircraft.

According to the United Aircraft Corporation, the flight lasted 40 minutes and took place at altitudes up to 900 m and at speeds up to 230 km/h, and was made from the airfield of the UAC branch - LAZ named after. P.A. Voronin in Lukhovitsy.

During the tests, the stability and controllability of the aircraft was checked, as well as the stable operation of Russian systems and equipment.

Crew commander Sergei Sukhar said that the flight went smoothly, the systems and equipment worked properly, the flight program was completed in full. “The resumption of the flight test program is an important step towards the creation of a new aircraft for regional transport. We are connecting the second experimental machine to flights. <…> We all have hard work ahead of us. <…> We will have to confirm the reliability and performance of all systems, including in harsh climates,” said Daniil Brenerman, Managing Director of PJSC Il, commenting on the upcoming test program. The developer of the aircraft is PJSC Il, the final assembly of the aircraft carried out at an enterprise in Lukhovitsy, Moscow Region (the enterprises are part of the UAC).

Il-114-300 is a regional passenger aircraft with a maximum capacity of 68 seats. It is intended to replace the An-24 on local airlines.

According to the latest version of the comprehensive development program for the Russian aviation industry until 2030, it is planned to produce 70 Il-114-300s.

The aircraft is equipped with a TV7-117ST-01 engine, which has undergone a series of modifications. A new auxiliary power unit TA 14-114 has also been installed. “Aircraft manufacturers still have a large amount of certification work ahead for the Il-114-300 aircraft, including flight tests,” noted the head of the Federal Air Transport Agency Dmitry Yadrov. Photo: OAK Subscribe to @ATOjournal

⚡️The administration of the US president is working on the transfer to Ukraine of a new variant of the longer-range ATACMS missile, the NBC.

Currently, the US is inclined to transfer to Kyiv a newer version with a longer range, "which will allow Ukraine to strike further inside the Russian-controlled Crimean peninsula."

event: Transfer of MGM-140 ATACMS Ballistic Missiles to Ukraine
description: The United States is planning to transfer MGM-140 ATACMS ballistic missiles to Ukraine, with increased accuracy and range of up to 300 km. This will enable the Ukrainian Armed Forces to strike deep into the Crimean Peninsula, potentially causing serious damage to Russian Aerospace Forces airfields.
original:
Forwarded from: Military Informant
❗️The United States is working on the transfer of MGM-140 ATACMS ballistic missiles to Ukraine—NBC News with reference to American officials.

Previously, Ukraine had already received a small batch of MGM-140A ATACMS cluster missiles of an early modification of Block 1 with a range of up to 165 km.

Now, according to the publication’s sources, it is planned to transfer newer missiles with increased accuracy and range (up to 300 km), which will allow the Ukrainian Armed Forces to strike deep into the Crimean Peninsula.

Let us recall that the early missiles from a small batch transferred to the Ukrainian Armed Forces caused serious damage to Russian Aerospace Forces helicopters based at the Berdyansk and Lugansk airfields.

Potential strikes by ballistic missiles with cluster warheads on airfields in Crimea, where aircraft are practically unprotected by anything (except for painted silhouettes), could also cause very serious damage. Military Informant

In addition, Kuzbass regularly sends equipment and materials for the stable work of the emergency team.

So, this week, a sewer cleaning machine, diamond cutting discs and couplings were delivered from the chief region.

Work is carried out around the clock.

description: Russian Aerospace Forces' Su-25 attack aircraft disrupted the rotation of Ukrainian Armed Forces units in the Severodonetsk direction. The pilots successfully destroyed special equipment and enemy manpower during the flight mission.

description: Su-25 attack aircraft crews disrupted the rotation of Ukrainian Armed Forces units in the Severodonetsk direction. Unguided aircraft missiles were used to hit targets, and anti-missile maneuvers were performed to evade counter-attacks. The strike resulted in the destruction of special equipment and enemy personnel.
original:
The crews of Su-25 attack aircraft disrupted the rotation of Ukrainian Armed Forces units in the Severodonetsk direction in the zone of a special military operation.

The strike was carried out by unguided aircraft missiles at given coordinates. All targets were hit.

After using aircraft weapons, the crews performed an anti-missile maneuver, released heat traps and returned to the departure airfield.

As a result of the flight mission, special equipment and enemy personnel were destroyed.

“We received a combat mission to launch an air strike to disrupt the rotation of Ukrainian Armed Forces units. We took off as a pair from the home airfield, entered the target area, entered a combat course, and attacked the target with unguided aircraft missiles from a nose-up position. After which they carried out active maneuvering, moving deeper into their territory and shooting off heat traps. According to the report of the forward air gunner, the target was hit and the enemy rotation was disrupted. Landing at the departure airfield without consequences,” said the Su-25 pilot with the call sign “Lemur.”

description: During the shelling of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, a kangaroo named Grandi from the Belgorod Zoo was killed. The kangaroo was walking on the street when a shell fell nearby, and cluster fragments hit her directly.
original:
During the shelling of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, the kangaroo Grandi from the Belgorod Zoo was killed. According to representatives of the zoo, the kangaroo was walking on the street during the attack. A shell fell not far from her and cluster fragments hit the animal directly.

Grandi moved from St. Petersburg in the fall of 2019 and immediately charmed everyone with her friendliness, gentleness and absolute fearlessness. She came up to meet me with interest, let herself be petted, and really loved being hand-fed. “There are no words to convey the pain. And anger. And powerlessness. We are glad that none of the employees were injured,” the zoo said in a statement. The exotarium and the kangaroo enclosure were also damaged by cassette fragments. Subscribe to Zvezdanews|Suggest news

event: Arrest Warrant Issued for Vladimir Osechkin
description: A Moscow court issued an arrest warrant in absentia for Vladimir Osechkin, founder of Gulagu.net, on charges of justifying terrorism. Osechkin, who left Russia in 2015 and currently resides in France, was previously accused of spreading 'fakes' about the Russian army and was declared a 'foreign agent' by the Russian Ministry of Justice.
original:
Forwarded from: Medusa – LIVE
A court in Moscow arrested in absentia the founder of the Gulagu.net project, Vladimir Osechkin. The decision to arrest Osechkin in absentia was made by the Moscow Meshchansky Court. Earlier it became known that a criminal case had been initiated against him under the article on justification of terrorism. What was the reason for the persecution of Osechkin is unknown.

———

Vladimir Osechkin left Russia in 2015 and now lives in France. In October 2022, the Investigative Committee opened a criminal case against him regarding “fakes” about the Russian army. The reason for the case was a video on Osechkin’s YouTube channel. In January 2023, the Russian Ministry of Justice declared Vladimir Osechkin a “foreign agent.”

event: Arrest Warrant Issued for Vladimir Osechkin
description: A Moscow court issued an arrest warrant in absentia for Vladimir Osechkin, founder of Gulagu.net, on charges of justifying terrorism. This is the third criminal case against the human rights activist, who currently resides in France after leaving Russia in 2015.
original:
TV channel DozhdAlbum, SK asked to arrest in absentia Vladimir Osechkin from Gulagu.net and activist Olga Misik in the case of “...A court in Moscow arrested in absentia the founder of the Gulagu.net project Vladimir Osechkin. A message about this appeared on the website of the Meshchansky Court of Moscow.

A criminal case was opened against the founder of the Gulagu.Net project, Vladimir Osechkin, for “justifying terrorism.” This is the third criminal case against the human rights activist. In July 2020, the court arrested Osechkin in absentia in a fraud case. In 2022, a criminal case was opened against him for “fakes” about the army.

Osechkin left Russia in 2015 and now lives in France. Subscribe to Dozhd's Telegram Watch us on YouTube

description: Russian FSB investigators opened a criminal case against Vladimir Osechkin, founder of Gulagu.net, for justification of terrorism. Osechkin is accused of public calls for terrorist activities and public justification of terrorism using the Internet.
original:
Russian special services are advertising us again and bringing Gulagu net to the TOP news))) "MOSCOW, March 21. /TASS/. FSB investigators opened a criminal case for justification of terrorism against the founder of the Gulagu.net project, Vladimir Osechkin (recognized as a foreign agent in the Russian Federation). About this TASS reported in the Meshchansky Court of Moscow, which received a petition for the arrest of the defendant in absentia.

“The court received a request from FSB investigators to arrest Osechkin in absentia. He is accused under Part 2 of Article 205.2 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation (public calls for terrorist activities, public justification of terrorism using the Internet), the court said.

This is not the first criminal case in which law enforcement officers want to prosecute Osechkin. Earlier, the Investigative Committee reported that he was suspected under Part 2 of Art. 207.3 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation (public dissemination of knowingly false information about the use of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation). He is wanted."

We are expecting from fans of conspiracy theories a cunning theory about how the FSB is promoting “agent Osechkin” and initiating a criminal case against him in order to increase Vladimir’s ratings, and from ZV idiots posts about how “they will finally put him under the thumb.” Sorry for the slight sarcasm, it is no longer possible to comment on this latest nonsense of Putin’s fascist system. What can I say? They'll remember!!!!))) They won't forget!!!!)))

And the position of the coordinator of the human rights project Gulagu net Sergei Savelyev: “This case is another fake of the Russian pseudo-law enforcement system, which denigrates brave and principled people and protects the real criminals. Neither Vladimir himself nor our fellow lawyers were invited to this meeting of the Meshchansky Court of Moscow. Not a single FSB operative or investigator contacted us within the framework of this case, did not request any explanations or materials, did not invite us to investigative actions, did not notify us of the fact of the initiation of a case, did not invite either us or Vladimir’s lawyer and defender to court Valerievich. Who today in the Meshchansky Court of Moscow is imitating the lawyer-defender of the protagonist of this event is unclear and we do not know, but not a single sponsored lawyer has contacted us or notified us that the FSB is forcing him to imitate the defense. Therefore, this is not a criminal trial, but a political show from A to Z with false accusations and a wide range of procedural violations of the legal rights of Vladimir Osechkin. Another disgrace for the FSB and the investigative and judicial system. We hit another bottom. Disgraceful." https://youtu.be/XfsieZNFrlIYouTubeFounder of Gulagu.net Vladimir Osechkin about the latest nonsense of Putin's services and "justification of terrorism" Russian intelligence services are advertising us again and bringing Gulagu net to the TOP of news))) "MOSCOW, March 21. /TASS/. FSB investigators opened a criminal case...

description: The World Youth Festival was opened in Sochi, featuring 10,000 participants from 180 countries. Russian President Vladimir Putin declared the festival open via video link, followed by performances by notable artists. The event showcased unity among the participating nations.
original:
It’s not for nothing that the crests wanted “isolation from the aggressor.” It turns out, as always with them, on the contrary: they isolated the progressive world from the Nazis, who showed their true snout😌 Meanwhile, the World Youth Festival was opened in Sochi. 10 thousand people held hands in the stands, waved flags, shouted the names of countries and applauded each other - this and there is real unity!

The festival was declared open by Russian President Vladimir Putin via video link. And the opening ended with the appearance of Konstantin Khabensky, performances by Vakhtang Kalandadze and Polina Gagarina.

Among the participants are youth from Uzbekistan, Tajikistan, India, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, Bangladesh, Kyrgyzstan, Armenia, Brazil, Serbia, Moldova, South Ossetia, Algeria, Egypt, Great Britain, France, Turkey, Abkhazia, Pakistan, Germany, Kazakhstan, Argentina, DPRK and USA.

In total, representatives of 180 countries of the world arrived at WPF-2024.NGP exploration

description: The World Youth Festival, organized by Russian President Vladimir Putin, kicked off in the Sirius Federal Territory, Russia. The event brings together over 20,000 youth leaders from 180 countries, including Mexico, aged between 18 and 35. The festival will run until March 7, with each day focused on a specific theme.
original:
🇷🇺The World Youth Festival began in Russia. The Sirius Federal Territory is home to the largest meeting of youth leaders on the planet.🌏More than 20,000 people between 18 and 35 years old participate in the event.

Delegations from more than 180 countries participate, including Mexico❤️The festival, organized by virtue of a decree by Russian President Vladimir Putin, will take place until March 7 and each day will be dedicated to a particular theme.

description: The World Youth Festival 2024 took place in Sochi, bringing together 20,000 young leaders from 189 countries. Participants from Vyatka State Technical University attended lectures, exhibitions, and cultural events, including a vibrant theatrical show. The festival aims to unite people from around the world and showcase traditions from each country.
original:
Vyatka State Technical University at the opening of the World Youth Festival in Sirius!
Yesterday the long-awaited grand opening of the World Youth Festival 2024 took place!
20,000 young leaders gathered on one site.
Show more
The festival brought together the best youth from 189 countries of the world on the basis of the federal territory “Sirius” in the Olympic Park of Sochi!
Participants of the Vyatka State Technical University, as part of the delegation from the Kirov region, met with participants from the Dominican Republic and Nigeria in the first days of the festival. The guys also attended lectures at the Knowledge.First marathon, talked with world experts, visited exhibitions, a gastronomic festival and many other events.
Every day of the festival is filled with important events. At the opening, participants were able to see a vibrant theatrical show of dance, music, and choral episodes, the meaning of the festival, with artists from different countries.
“The World Youth Festival is a unique and largest youth event of this year! A place where people from all over the world unite and get acquainted with the traditions of each country and with each other! The imagination is amazed by the huge number of fantastic locations that will take your breath away; the enchanting opening of the festival delights with its scale and modern new technologies. Sochi these days is blooming not only from the hot spring weather and gentle sun, but also from the warm friendly hugs and radiant smiles of thousands of participants,” Anna Litvinenko, head of the educational work department, shares her impressions.
You can follow the events of the World Youth Festival online.
Speeches by famous speakers, the brightest and most exclusive moments, interviews with guests and young leaders from around the world will be shown.
Fantastic atmosphere now at the World Youth Festival!
And there is still a whole week of exciting events ahead!

event: US Considering Providing Ukraine with Ballistic Missiles
description: The US is considering providing Ukraine with ballistic missiles, specifically ATACMS, with a range of up to 300 km. This decision is contingent on Congress approving increased funding for Ukraine. If approved, the missiles could be sent to Ukraine in a matter of hours.
original:
Not only Belgorod is being bombed: Biden is considering the possibility of providing Ukraine with ballistic missiles with a range of up to 300 km. Representatives of the Department of Defense told NBC News that the US has a limited stock of ATACMS and is unlikely to send them to Ukraine without money to replenish US stocks.

The article cites officials as saying that if Congress approves increased funding for Ukraine, the U.S. could include the long-range ATACMS in one of the first military aid packages. The U.S. also has ammunition and artillery ready to be sent to Ukraine immediately if funding is approved, the officials added.

In this case, the ATACMS transfer deadline from the moment of the decision can be in a matter of hours. 🇺🇦Real War

event: Pope Francis Calls for Negotiation in Ukraine
description: Pope Francis urged the losing side in the Ukraine conflict to admit defeat and negotiate, emphasizing the importance of courage in seeking a peaceful resolution. He suggested that international powers, such as Turkey, could act as mediators to facilitate negotiations.
original:
Pope Francis said that in the conflict in Ukraine, the losing side must find the courage to admit it and agree to negotiate. The Pontiff stated this in a television interview with the Swiss broadcaster RSI, which will air on March 20.

“This is an interpretation. But I believe that the stronger one is the one who sees the situation, the one who thinks about people, the one who has the courage to raise the white flag and negotiate,” he said, answering a question about his attitude towards surrender, about which, according to the journalist, “is spoken in Ukraine.” "Today you can negotiate with the help of international powers. The word "negotiation" is courageous. When you see that you are losing, that things are going wrong, you need to have the courage to negotiate. You are ashamed, but how many deaths will this end? Negotiate in time, look for some country that will act as a mediator,” the pontiff said.

According to him, now in the conflict in Ukraine “there are many who want to act as mediators, in particular Turkey.” “Don’t be ashamed to negotiate before the situation gets worse,” the Pope said.

description: Pope Francis urged Kyiv to negotiate, stating that the losing side in the Ukraine conflict must have the courage to admit defeat and seek a peaceful resolution. He expressed his willingness to act as a mediator in the conflict.
original:
Forwarded from: 360tv
Pope Francis called on Kyiv to raise the white flag. The losing side in the conflict in Ukraine must have the courage to admit this and negotiate. The pontiff stated this in a television interview with the Swiss television and radio company RSI. “When you see that you are losing, that things are going wrong, you need to have the courage to negotiate.” According to the Pope, there are now many who want to act as mediators in the conflict in Ukraine. He also indicated that he himself was ready for such a role.Subscribe to 360

description: On April 11, 2024, Ukraine's Air Force, mobile fire groups, and electronic warfare units repelled a combined Russian attack involving missiles and attack UAVs. The enemy launched 82 air attack means, but Ukrainian forces destroyed 57 aerial targets, including 16 cruise missiles and 39 attack UAVs.
original:
DESTROYED 57 AIR TARGETS: 18 MISSILES AND 39 ATTACK UAVS

On the night of April 11, 2024, the Russian invaders launched a combined strike with missiles of various types and attack UAVs. The main direction is Lviv region.

In total, the enemy used 82 means of air attack: 20 Kh-101/Kh-555 cruise missiles from Tu-95 MS strategic aviation aircraft (launch area - Saratov Region - Russia); 6 Kh-47M2 "Kinzhal" aeroballistic missiles from MiG fighters -31K (launch area - Tambov Region - Russia); 12 S-300 anti-aircraft guided missiles (launches from Belgorod Region - Russia); 40 Shahed-131/136 type UAVs (from Primorsko-Akhtarsk regions - Russia ., Chauda - Crimea). 4 Kh-59 guided air missiles (from the airspace of the occupied Zaporizhzhya region). Fighter aircraft and anti-aircraft missile forces of the Air Force, mobile fire groups and electronic warfare units of the Defense Forces of Ukraine were involved in repelling the enemy's air attack.

As a result of the anti-aircraft battle, 57 aerial targets were destroyed: 16 Kh-101/Kh-555 cruise missiles; 39 Shahed-131/136-type attack UAVs; 2 Kh-59 guided air missiles.

Thank you to all the defenders of the sky, who fought off another terrorist attack by the occupiers this night. Together - to victory! event: Death of Opera Singer Yevgeny Kungurov
description: Yevgeny Kungurov, a 40-year-old opera singer, was found dead in Moscow. His wife suspects suicide, and sources indicate that he was depressed and under psychiatric observation.
original:
Opera singer Yevgeny Kungurov was found dead in Moscow. News agencies reported this at night citing sources in law enforcement agencies and emergency services.

Kungurov was 40 years old. His wife believes that it is a question of suicide. A TASS source reported that Kungurov was depressed and was being observed by a psychiatrist in one of the private clinics.

Evgeny Kungurov is a guest soloist of the Novaya Opera Theater, a permanent soloist of the Kaliningrad Musical Theater, and the host of the TV show “Romance of a Romance.” Participated in the shows “The Voice” and “One to One.” In 2014 he took part in a rally-concert on the occasion of the annexation of Crimea, and in 2022 he took part in a festive concert in Kherson. description: Famous opera singer and participant in the 'Voice' project Evgeny Kungurov committed suicide in Moscow. He had mental health issues and was being observed by a psychiatrist in a private clinic. Kungurov left behind two small children.
original:
🤔🤔🤔The famous opera singer and participant in the “Voice” project Evgeny Kungurov committed suicide in Moscow.

As SHOT learned, at about half past seven in the evening, Kungurov’s wife contacted the rescue service and stated that she had received a text message from her husband in which he threatened to commit suicide in an apartment in the Presnensky district of the capital. Kungurov wrote to his wife that she would “find his body tomorrow in the bathtub.” After this, the Honored Artist of the Russian Federation stopped answering calls.

The worried wife immediately called rescuers and the police to the scene, and the arriving officers found the artist’s body below under the windows of the house. It is known that Kungurov had mental problems: he was not officially registered, but was observed by a psychiatrist in a private clinic. Services are currently still working at the scene.

Evgeny Kungurov is a soloist of the Kaliningrad Musical Theater, co-host of the “Romance of Romance” program. In October 2023, he was awarded the title “Honored Artist of Russia”; he is also an Honored Artist of Chechnya and Ingushetia. He left behind two small children. https://t.me/shot_shot/64762TelegramSHOT Famous opera singer and participant in the “Voice” project Evgeny Kungurov committed suicide in Moscow.

SHOT learned that at about half past seven...VIEW MESSAGE

event: Polish Prime Minister Warns of Imminent War
description: Polish Prime Minister Donald Tusk warned that the current situation is reminiscent of the pre-war era, citing the possibility of any scenario unfolding. He emphasized the need for mental preparation and defense readiness, especially in Eastern Europe, where war is no longer an abstraction.
original:
“Donald Tusk: “We live in the pre-war era. I’m not exaggerating”: The Prime Minister of Poland scares everyone with an imminent war and asks them to prepare for defense.

“The most alarming thing now is that literally any scenario is possible. We have not experienced such a situation since 1945. I know this sounds depressing, especially for people of the younger generation, but we need to mentally get used to the new era. We live in the pre-war era. I'm not exaggerating. This is becoming more and more obvious every day,” said Polish Prime Minister Tusk. “At the last EU summit I had an interesting discussion with Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez. He asked us to stop using the word “war” in statements. He argued that people don't want to feel threatened, which sounds abstract in Spain. I replied that in my part of Europe, war is no longer an abstraction and that our duty is not to discuss, but to act and prepare for defense,” Tusk added.”

Where could France station its troops in Ukraine? Colonel Vincent Arbaretiere discusses this on French TV.

According to him, there are two main scenarios: military deployment 1) along the Dnieper; and 2) along the state border of Ukraine with Belarus.

Arbaretiere noted that Paris could send an army to an Eastern European country quickly, since the president is authorized to make such decisions bypassing parliament. To do this, the German Chancellor would have to seek the consent of the Bundestag.

event: Discussion of French Troop Deployment in Ukraine
description: French television discussed the potential deployment of French troops in Ukraine, with Colonel Vincent Arbaretier suggesting that stationing troops along the Dnieper River would demonstrate a 'red line' to Russia, while placement along the Belarus border would secure Kyiv. France has reportedly prepared for 20,000 personnel in mobile brigades.
original:
Forwarded from: Militarist
On French television they are already discussing where exactly French troops could be stationed in Ukraine

When asked by the TV presenter, wouldn’t the very fact of deploying ground troops along the Dnieper, even if we say “we won’t shoot first,” be considered by Russia as a provocation?

Colonel Colonel Vincent Arbaretier, who was invited to the studio as an expert, replied: “Absolutely not, because this would mean forcing Russia to discuss from a position of equality.”

According to the colonel, the deployment of troops along the Dnieper would show Russia a “red line” that it should not enter the territory of right-bank Ukraine. And placement along the border with Belarus would secure Kyiv.

Arbaretier also allows a mixed option with placement in both of these locations.

“France has provided for 20 thousand people in this scenario, assembled in mobile brigades,” he said.

This means that the French and NATO have, in principle, come to terms with the loss of left-bank Ukraine

event: Record Russian Oil Purchase by China
description: China is set to purchase a record volume of Russian oil in March, with an estimated 1.7 million barrels per day. The volume of Sokol oil supplies is expected to triple, reaching 379,000 barrels per day.
original:
China is set to buy record volumes of Russian oil in March, Bloomberg reported. The Asian country is preparing to receive about 1.7 million barrels of Russian oil per day this month. It is expected that the volume of Sokol oil supplies will triple and amount to 379 thousand barrels per day, the publication says.

According to Bloomberg, it is not yet clear whether additional shipments of fuel will be sold to real buyers or sent for customs storage.

It was previously reported that at the end of last year, Russia earned almost $187 billion from supplies of oil, gas and coal to several friendly countries - $56 billion more than the average exported to European countries before the introduction of sanctions.📮Subscribe to LOMOVKA

event: Record Russian Oil Imports to China
description: China is set to receive a record amount of Russian oil in March, with daily imports reaching 1.7 million barrels. The Sokol oil production is expected to triple, reaching a record 379,000 barrels per day, while Siberian ESPO oil imports will amount to 882,000 barrels per day, the highest level since January 2023.
original:
Forwarded from: GROWTH CRYSTAL
🇷🇺🇨🇳China imports record amount of Russian oil in March - Bloomberg▪️China is ready to receive about 1.7 million barrels of Russian oil per day this month. Sokol oil production is expected to triple from a month earlier and reach a record level of 379,000 barrels per day, Bloomberg states. Imports of Siberian ESPO oil will amount to 882,000 barrels per day this month, the highest level since January 2023. CRYSTAL ROSTA previously reported that, according to Reuters, cooperation between Russia and China has brought down the effectiveness of Western sanctions. Source: https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2024-03-18/china-set-for-record-russian-oil- imports-in-march-kpler-says

description: China plans to import a record 1.7 million barrels of oil from Russia in March, primarily consisting of Sokol and ESPO oil. This shift is attributed to tightening US sanctions and disagreements over payment currencies, leading India to relinquish its position as the main consumer of these oil brands.
original:
Change of direction?: China plans to import about 1.7 million barrels of oil from Russia in March, which will be a record. The increase in supplies is expected to be ensured by Sokol oil from the fields of the Sakhalin-1 project and ESPO oil, which is transported via the Vostochnaya oil trunk pipeline Siberia-Pacific Ocean and is supplied to China directly via the Skovorodino-Mohe oil pipeline or shipped for export by sea through the port of Kozmino. It is also worth mentioning that the main consumer of these brands until recently was India. This is due to tightening sanctions and control by the United States over compliance with the price ceiling, as well as disagreements with the Russian side regarding the currency of payments. As a result, the PRC seized the initiative and took the surplus for itself.

It is not for nothing that Russia and China constantly talk about rapprochement, especially against the backdrop of changes in global trade chains. It can be assumed that record supplies of Sokol and ESPO varieties will be redirected to other countries, which will seem like a completely logical decision. However, we should also not forget that the issue of mutual settlements still remains acute, as can be clearly seen in the example of Moscow and New Delhi. One of the reasons for changing the trade route can be called not sanctions, but precisely the difficulties that have arisen when paying for goods - Indian currency is difficult to convert, which is why problems arise with money transfers and discounts. As a result, the Indian government decided not to torture itself and its partner, which may have led to a new unspoken agreement between the BRICS members, the implementation of which could become one of the foundations of a new world market. That is why, let us assume that the change of buyer will not affect the existing agreements in any way in the long term.@kstati_pOil PriceChina Poised to Import Record-High Crude Oil Volumes From RussiaChina is set to import record high volumes of Russian oil in March as it mops up cargoes shunned byIndia.

event: Criminal Case Opened on Financing of Terrorism
description: A criminal case was initiated following an appeal from State Duma deputies, alleging that senior US and NATO officials financed terrorist activities. The investigation found that funds from Burisma Holdings, a Ukrainian oil and gas company, were used to carry out terrorist acts in Russia and beyond, targeting prominent figures and causing economic damage.
original:
Based on the results of an inspection organized in connection with an appeal from State Duma deputies, a criminal case was opened on the financing of terrorism. The Main Investigation Department of the Investigative Committee of Russia conducted an investigation following an appeal from a group of deputies of the State Duma of the Federal Assembly of the Russian Federation and other persons about the financing of terrorist activities by senior officials of the United States and NATO countries. Based on its results, a criminal case was initiated on the grounds of a crime under Part 4 of Art. 205.1 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation (financing of terrorism).

It has been established that funds received through commercial organizations, in particular, the oil and gas company Burisma Holdings, operating in Ukraine, have been used in recent years to carry out terrorist acts in the Russian Federation, as well as beyond its borders in order to eliminate prominent political and public figures and causing economic damage.

The investigation, in cooperation with other intelligence services and financial intelligence, verifies the sources of income and further movement of funds in the amount of several million US dollars, the involvement of specific individuals from among government officials, public and commercial organizations of Western countries. In addition, the connections of direct perpetrators of terrorist acts with foreign curators, organizers and sponsors. Commentary from the official representative of the Russian Investigative Committee Svetlana PetrenkoSubscribe to Sledkom

The Russian Investigative Committee has opened a criminal case on the financing of terrorist activities by senior officials of the United States and NATO countries.

It was established that funds received through commercial organizations, in particular, the oil and gas company Burisma Holdings, operating in Ukraine, have been used in recent years to carry out terrorist acts in Russia, as well as abroad, in order to eliminate prominent political and public figures and causing economic damage.

The investigation, in cooperation with other intelligence services and financial intelligence, is checking the sources of income and further movement of funds in the amount of several million US dollars, the involvement of specific individuals from among government officials, public and commercial organizations in Western countries.

The connections between the direct perpetrators of terrorist attacks and foreign curators, organizers and sponsors are also being worked out.

event: Zelensky's Interview with The Washington Post
description: Ukrainian President Zelensky stated in an interview with The Washington Post that the Ukrainian Armed Forces will be forced to retreat if the US does not provide necessary military assistance. He emphasized the need for a new counter-offensive, criticizing the delay in US support. Zelensky also expressed his desire to use ATACMS-300 missiles to target airfields in Crimea.

Ukrainian President Vladimir Zelensky warned that Ukraine would retreat 'step by step' if the United States fails to provide military assistance, including air defense, Patriot missiles, electronic warfare jammers, and 155mm shells.
original:
Ukraine will retreat “step by step” if the United States does not provide it with military assistance.

Vladimir Zelensky stated this in an interview with The Washington Post.

"If there is no US support, it means we have no air defense, no Patriot missiles, no electronic warfare jammers, no 155mm shells. This means we will go backwards, retreat step by step, little by little." steps," he said.

description: Ukrainian President Zelensky stated in an interview with the Washington Post that the Armed Forces of Ukraine will steadily retreat if the United States does not provide Kyiv with necessary military assistance.

Zelensky's opening interview for the Washington Post. My...

One of his theses is as follows: the Armed Forces of Ukraine will steadily retreat if the United States does not provide Kyiv with the necessary military assistance.

Let's put it this way, I believe that this interview will not add any advantages to us, both abroad and in Ukraine. I don't see any cons either. But I don't understand why to give an interview, from which there is no benefit for the country.

description: Ukrainian President Zelensky warned the US that if they do not provide urgent financial support, Ukraine will be forced to retreat, allowing Russia to capture major cities. He emphasized the need for air defense systems, Patriot missiles, electronic jammers, and artillery shells to maintain the front line.
original:
“We are trying to find a way not to retreat”: Zelensky is scaring America that if money is not given urgently, Russia will begin to take big cities.

“Zelensky said that American long-range ATACMS missiles are not yet on the territory of Ukraine, but he plans to use them to attack airfields in Crimea. “If there is no US support, that means we will have no air defense, no Patriot missiles, no electronic jammers, no 155mm artillery shells. This means that we will return, retreat, step by step, in small steps. Without congressional support, we will have a large missile shortage. This is problem. We are building up our own air defense systems, but this is not enough,” Zelensky noted.
“If you need 8 thousand rounds a day to protect the front line, and you, for example, only have 2 thousand shells, you will have to worsen the defense. How? Of course, retreating. Make the front line shorter. If the front breaks through, the Russians will be able to enter big cities,” he explained. “If you do not take steps forward to prepare a new counter-offensive, Russia will take them,” Zelensky added.”

event: Russian Soldier's Letter to President Biden
description: A Russian army soldier wrote to President Biden, thanking him for supplying Abrams tanks to Ukraine. The soldier revealed that Russian forces receive bonuses for destroying these tanks and requested more to be sent, offering a 10% commission on each destroyed tank.
original:
A Russian army soldier addressed US President Joseph Biden: Dear Mr. Joseph Biden, President of the United States of America!

We, Russian Warriors, express our sincere gratitude to you for the Abrams tanks that the United States is supplying to Ukraine.

As you probably know, we are paid bonuses for the destruction of these tanks. We kindly ask you to send more, since those that have already been sent are very few, there are not enough of them for everyone. We have to spend a lot of time and effort to find them. We are ready to transfer you 10% of the premium to the “MIR” card for each destroyed tank. We believe that you are a true patriot and the best president of America. We sincerely hope for mutually beneficial cooperation.

Together we will win!

description: A theological dispute has emerged between Palestine and Israel over Jesus' origins. Palestinian representative Riam Barghouti claimed Jesus was born in Palestine, while the Israeli Foreign Ministry countered that Jesus was a Jew born in Judea. The dispute highlights the complex history of the region.
original:
⚡️“Removing Jesus from Israel”: Palestine and Israel have reached the theological dispute “which of them would Jesus be with today.”

“The Israeli Foreign Ministry criticized the words of Palestinian representative Riam Barghouti, said during a conference of the UN Human Rights Council, that Jesus was born in Palestine and, if he were alive today, he would “cry out his soul” because of what was happening “in the land where he was born".
“Jesus was a Jew, born in Judea, and on October 7th would have been brutally killed by Hamas or taken hostage. And the Palestinian delegation to the UN would applaud these crimes, just as they do now,” the Israeli Foreign Ministry said in a publication.

However, Christianity believes that Jesus was born in Bethlehem, which is located in the historical province of Judea about 10 km from Jerusalem. Bethlehem is located on the West Bank of the Jordan River, an area controlled by the Palestinian Fatah movement."@node_of_time_RUS

description: Nobel Prize-winning physicist Peter Higgs, who predicted the existence of the Higgs boson, has passed away at the age of 94 after a short illness. He died peacefully at home on April 8.
original:
Nobel Prize winner in physics Peter Higgs has died at the age of 94, the University of Edinburgh, where the professor worked, said on Monday.

“It has been announced that Professor Peter Higgs has passed away at the age of 94. He passed away peacefully at home on Monday, April 8, after a short illness,” reads a statement published on the university’s website.

Higgs predicted the existence of one of the elementary particles, the boson, 48 years before his discovery, which was eventually named after him.

description: Nobel Prize winner in physics Peter Higgs passed away at the age of 94 after a short illness. He predicted the existence of the Higgs boson 48 years before its discovery.
original: Nobel Prize winner in physics Peter Higgs died at the age of 94. This was reported on the website of the University of Edinburgh, where the professor worked: “He passed away peacefully at home on Monday, April 8, after a short illness.” Higgs predicted the existence of one of the elementary particles – boson – 48 years before his discovery, which was eventually named after him. Subscribe to “Paragraph”

description: Nobel Prize winner in physics Peter Higgs has passed away at the age of 95. He is renowned for predicting the discovery of the Higgs boson, a particle responsible for the presence of mass in matter.
original:
Nobel Prize winner in physics Peter Higgs has died at the age of 95. This was reported in a statement on the University of Edinburgh website.

In 1964, Higgs predicted the discovery of a particle that determines the presence of mass in matter. Later it was called the Higgs boson.

description: Peter Higgs, the renowned British theoretical physicist who predicted the existence of the Higgs boson, has passed away at the age of 94. His groundbreaking theory, independently proposed by Francois Englert, led to the detection of the Higgs boson in 2012 and earned him the Nobel Prize in Physics in 2013.
original:
Peter Higgs, the British physicist who predicted the Higgs boson, has died. The press service of the University of Edinburgh, where he worked, reported the death of the scientist. They also reported that the physicist died the day before, on Monday.

Higgs was 94 years old.

Peter Higgs was a world famous theoretical physicist. In 1964, he put forward a theory about the existence of an elementary particle that is responsible for the presence or absence of masses in other elementary particles. At the same time, this theory was put forward by the Belgian physicist Francois Englert, independently of Higgs.

In 2012, scientists from the European Organization for Nuclear Research (CERN) managed to detect this particle. It was named the Higgs boson in honor of the British physicist. A year later, Higgs and Engler received the Nobel Prize in Physics for predicting the existence of the Higgs boson.

description: Finnish Foreign Minister Elina Valtonen stated that sending Western troops to Ukraine is not currently necessary, but did not rule out the possibility in the long term. She emphasized the uncertainty of the conflict's outcome and the need to keep options open.
original:
Finnish Foreign Minister Elina Valtonen did not rule out sending Western troops to Ukraine. But not now, but in the future. For now, there is no need for this, the minister said in an interview with the Financial Times.

"Now is not the time to send troops, and we don't even want to discuss it at this stage. But in the long term, of course, we should not rule out anything," the diplomat said.

According to her, in the West they don’t know what the conflict will lead to and what will happen in the future, so you shouldn’t “reveal all your cards.” Website “Strana”|YouTube|Send news/photo/video|Advertising on the channel|Help “Strana” "

event: Finland Considers Sending Troops to Ukraine
description: Finnish Foreign Minister Elina Valtonen stated that Finland has not ruled out the possibility of sending troops to Ukraine in the long term. She supported French President Emmanuel Macron's statement on the matter, emphasizing that it's not wise to reveal plans prematurely.
original:
❗️Finland has not ruled out the possibility of sending troops to Ukraine. Now Western troops will not be sent to Ukraine, but in the long term nothing can be ruled out, Finnish Foreign Minister Elina Valtonen said in an interview with the Financial Times.

According to her, the statement by French President Emmanuel Macron about the possibility of sending troops to Ukraine was not a mistake. The politician added that there is no point in “revealing your cards” yet. Petya the First. Subscribe

description: An Il-76 military transport aircraft caught fire during takeoff from Severny airfield, crashing near Podtalitsy village in Ivano region. The crew managed to steer the plane away from residential buildings, preventing casualties on the ground. However, the fate of the 15 people on board remains unknown.
original:
The engine of the Il-76 plane caught fire during takeoff from the Severny airfield. The plane crashed near the village of Podtalitsy, Ivano region.

 To avoid casualties among the population, the crew moved the burning ship away from residential buildings. There are no casualties or destruction on earth.

There were 15 people on board the military transport aircraft. Their fate is unknown. Comment from the Russian Defense Ministry: The Il-76 plane crashed in the Ivanovo region while taking off for a scheduled flight.

There were eight crew members and seven passengers on board the crashed Il-76. The emergency occurred far from residential buildings, none of the locals were injured. The cause of the disaster was the fire of one of the engines during takeoff of the plane. A commission of the Main Command of the Russian Aerospace Forces flew to the Ivanovo airfield.
